S04bsu036_u:227: Saddhp_1.54 ye agradharmā sugatena spṛṣṭāstada bodhimaṇḍe puruṣottamena /
S04bsu036_u:228: kiṃ teha nirdekṣyati lokanātho atha vyākariṣyatyayu bodhisattvān //
S04bsu036_u:229: Saddhp_1.55 analpakaṃ kāraṇametta bheṣyati yaddarśitāḥ kṣetrasahasra neke /
S04bsu036_u:231: Saddhp_1.56 pṛccheti maitreyu jinasya putra spṛhenti te naramaruyakṣarākṣasāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:232: catvārimā parṣa udīkṣamāṇā mañjusvaraḥ kiṃ nviha vyākariṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:233_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:234_1: ca mahādharmolkāsaṃprajvālanaṃ ca mahādharmaśaṅkhābhiprapūraṇaṃ ca mahādharmabherīparāhaṇanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:234_2: ca mahādharmanirdeśaṃ ca adya kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:236: yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmidamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭamabhūt,
S04bsu036_u:238: tenaivaṃ prajānāmi - mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyaṃ tathāgataḥ kartukāmo mahādharmaśravaṇaṃ śrāvayitukāmaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:243_1: parataraṃ yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpo nāma [Vaidya_12]
S04bsu036_u:243_2: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu036_u:243_3: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:244: sa dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:245: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:246_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu036_u:247: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma //
S04bsu036_u:248_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu036_u:248_1: pareṇa parataraṃ candrasūryapradīpa eva nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi /
S04bsu036_u:249_0: iti hi ajita etena paraṃparodāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
S04bsu036_u:250: tatra ajita teṣāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇāṃ pūrvakaṃ tathāgatamupādāya yāvat paścimakastathāgataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:251_0: so 'pi candrasūryapradīpanāmadheya eva tathāgato 'bhūdarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu036_u:251_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:252: so 'pi dharmaṃ deśitavān ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:253: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:254_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān
S04bsu036_u:255: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharma deśitavān //
S04bsu036_u:256: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya aṣṭau putrā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:265: teṣāṃ khalu punarajita aṣṭānāṃ rājakumārāṇāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyaputrāṇāṃ vipularddhirabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:268: te taṃ bhagavantamabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsaṃ viditvā anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ śrutvā sarvarājyaparibhogānutsṛjya taṃ bhagavantamanu pravrajitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:270: sadā ca brahmacāriṇo bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāśca te rājakumārā abhuvan //
S04bsu036_u:271_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu036_u:271_1: mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
S04bsu036_u:271_2: bhāṣitvā [Vaidya_13] tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte tasminneva
S04bsu036_u:271_3: mahādharmāsane paryaṅkamābhujya anantanirdeśapratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno
S04bsu036_u:272: samanantarasamāpannasya khalu punastasya bhagavato māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ mahatpuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
S04bsu036_u:274: sarvāvacca tad buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūt calitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam /
S04bsu036_u:275_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena tena kālena ye tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
S04bsu036_u:277: te sarve saparivārāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayanti sma āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:278: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā /
S04bsu036_u:280: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sarvāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:281: tadyathāpi nāma ajita etarhyetāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante //
S04bsu036_u:282: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavato viṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ samanubaddhā abhuvan /
S04bsu036_u:284: te āścaryaprāptā abhūvan adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ kautūhalasamutpannā etena mahāraśmyavabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā //
S04bsu036_u:285: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:287: sa ca bhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya taṃ varaprabhaṃ bodhisattvamārabhya saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:288: yāvat paripūrṇān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpān bhāṣitavān ekāsane niṣaṇṇo 'saṃpravedhamānena kāyena aniñjamānena cittena /
S04bsu036_u:289: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadekāsane niṣaṇṇā tān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpāṃstasya bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sma /
S04bsu036_u:290: na ca tasyāṃ parṣadi ekasattvasyāpi kāyaklamatho 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:292_1: taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ
S04bsu036_u:292_3: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:292_4: purastāt - adya bhikṣavo 'syāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme tathāgato 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti //
S04bsu036_u:293_0: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śrīgarbhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:293_1: nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ
S04bsu036_u:293_2: parṣadamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrīgarbho bodhisattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ
S04bsu036_u:296: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:297: taṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān /
S04bsu036_u:298: aśītiṃ cāntarakalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:299: tatra ajita ye tasya bhagavato 'ṣṭau putrā abhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:303: taiśca tataḥ paścādbahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭāni satkṛtāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:306: teṣāṃ ca aṣṭānāmantevāsiśatānāmeko bodhisattvo 'dhimātraṃ lābhaguruko 'bhūt satkāraguruko jñātaguruko yaśaskāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:310: ārāgayitvā ca satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitānyarcitānyapacāyitāni /
S04bsu036_u:311: syātkhalu punaste ajita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:314: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:316: tvameva ajita sa tena kālena tena samayena yaśaskāmo nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt kausīdyaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:317: iti hi ajita ahamanena paryāyeṇedaṃ bhagavataḥ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpāṃ raśmimutsṛṣṭāmevaṃ parimīmāṃse,
S04bsu036_u:318: yathā bhagavānapi taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitukāmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:319: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta etamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:321: yadā jino āsi prajāna uttamaścandrasya sūryasya pradīpa nāma //
S04bsu036_u:322: Saddhp_1.58 saddharma deśeti prajāna nāyako vineti sattvāna anantakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:324: Saddhp_1.59 ye cāṣṭa putrāstada tasya āsan kumārabhūtasya vināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:325: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pravrajitaṃ mahāmuniṃ jahitva kāmāṃllaghu sarvi prāvrajan //
S04bsu036_u:326: Saddhp_1.60 dharmaṃ ca so bhāṣati lokanātho anantanirdeśavaraṃ ti sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:328: Saddhp_1.61 samanantaraṃ bhāṣiya so vināyakaḥ paryaṅka bandhitva kṣaṇasmi tasmin /
S04bsu036_u:330: Saddhp_1.62 divyaṃ ca māndāravavarṣamāsīdaghaṭṭitā dundubhayaśca neduḥ /
S04bsu036_u:331: devāśca yakṣāśca sthitāntarīkṣe kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamasya //
S04bsu036_u:332: Saddhp_1.63 sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pracacāla tatkṣaṇam āścaryamatyadbhutamāsi tatra /
S04bsu036_u:333: raśmiṃ ca ekāṃ pramumoca nāyako bhruvāntarāttāmatidarśanīyām //
S04bsu036_u:334: Saddhp_1.64 pūrvāṃ ca gatvā diśa sā hi raśmiraṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇā /
S04bsu036_u:335: prabhāsayaṃ bhrājati sarvalokaṃ darśeti sattvāna cyutopapādam //
S04bsu036_u:336: Saddhp_1.65 ratnāmayā kṣetra tathātra kecidvaiḍūryanirbhāsa tathaiva kecit /
S04bsu036_u:338: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
S04bsu036_u:339: Saddhp_1.66 devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
S04bsu036_u:341: ye cābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti pūjenti ca lokadhātuṣu //
S04bsu036_u:342: Saddhp_1.67 buddhāśca dṛśyanti svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇayūpā iva darśanīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:343: vaiḍūryamadhye ca suvarṇabimbaṃ parṣāya madhye pravadanti dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:344: Saddhp_1.68 tahi śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanā na vidyate te cāpramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:345: ekaikakṣetrasmi vināyakānāṃ raśmiprabhā darśayate hi sarvān //
S04bsu036_u:347: dṛśyanti putrā naranāyakānāṃ viharanti ye parvatakandareṣu //
S04bsu036_u:348: Saddhp_1.70 sarvasvadānāni parityajantaḥ kṣāntībalā dhyānaratāśca dhīrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:349: bahubodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ sarve 'pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā //
S04bsu036_u:350: Saddhp_1.71 aniñjamānāśca avedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:351: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasā dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:352: Saddhp_1.72 bhūtaṃ padaṃ śāntamanāsravaṃ ca prajānamānāśca prakāśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:354: Saddhp_1.73 dṛṣṭvā ca tā parṣa catasra tāyinaścandrārkadīpasya imaṃ prabhāvam /
S04bsu036_u:355: harṣasthitāḥ sarvi bhavitva tatkṣaṇamanyonya pṛcchanti kathaṃ nu etat //
S04bsu036_u:356: Saddhp_1.74 acirācca so naramaruyakṣapūjitaḥ samādhito vyutthita lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:357: varaprabhaṃ putra tadādhyabhāṣata yo bodhisattvo vidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:358: Saddhp_1.75 lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /
S04bsu036_u:359: tvaṃ hyatra sākṣī mama dharmakośe yathāhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām //
S04bsu036_u:360: Saddhp_1.76 saṃsthāpayitvā bahubodhisattvān harṣitva saṃvarṇiya saṃstavitvā /
S04bsu036_u:361: prabhāṣate tajjina agradharmān paripūrṇa so antarakalpa ṣaṣṭim //
S04bsu036_u:362: Saddhp_1.77 yaṃ caiva so bhāṣati lokanātho ekāsanasthaḥ pravarāgradharmam /
S04bsu036_u:363: taṃ sarvamādhārayi so jinātmajo varaprabho yo abhu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:364: Saddhp_1.78 so co jino bhāṣiya agradharmaṃ praharṣayitvā janatāmanekām /
S04bsu036_u:365: tasmiṃśca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ purato hi lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:366: Saddhp_1.79 prakāśitā me iya dharmanetrī ācakṣito dharmasvabhāva yādṛaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:367: nirvāṇakālo mama adya bhikṣavo rātrīya yāmasmiha madhyamasmin //
S04bsu036_u:368: Saddhp_1.80 bhavathāpramattā adhimuktisārā abhiyujyathā mahya imasmi śāsane /
S04bsu036_u:369: sudurlabhā bhonti jinā maharṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutāna atyayāt //
S04bsu036_u:371: Saddhp_1.81 saṃtāpajātā bahubuddhaputrā duḥkhena cogreṇa samarpitābhavan /
S04bsu036_u:374: Saddhp_1.82 āśvāsayitvā ca narendrarājā tāḥ prāṇakoṭyo bahavo acintiyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:375: mā bhāyathā bhikṣava nirvṛte mayi bhaviṣyatha buddha mamottareṇa //
S04bsu036_u:376: Saddhp_1.83 śrīgarbha eṣo vidu bodhisattvo gatiṃ gato jñāni anāsravasmin /
S04bsu036_u:377: spṛśiṣyate uttamamagrabodhiṃ vimalāgranetro ti jino bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:378: Saddhp_1.84 tāmeva rātriṃ tada yāmi madhyame parinirvṛto hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:379: śarīra vaistāriku tasya cābhūt stūpāna koṭīnayutā anantakā //
S04bsu036_u:380: Saddhp_1.85 bhikṣuśca tatrā tatha bhikṣuṇīyo ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:381: analpakāste yatha gaṅgabālikā abhiyukta tasyo sugatasya śāsane //
S04bsu036_u:382: Saddhp_1.86 yaścāpi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇako varaprabho yena sa dharma dhāritaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:383: aśīti so antarakalpa pūrṇāṃ tahi śāsane bhāṣati agradharmān //
S04bsu036_u:384: Saddhp_1.87 aṣṭāśataṃ tasya abhūṣi śiṣyāḥ paripācitā ye tada tena sarve /
S04bsu036_u:385: dṛṣṭā ca tebhirbahubuddhakoṭyaḥ satkāru teṣāṃ ca kṛto maharṣiṇām //
S04bsu036_u:386: Saddhp_1.88 caryāṃ caritvā tada ānulomikīṃ buddhā abhūvan bahulokadhātuṣu
S04bsu036_u:387: parasparaṃ te ca anantareṇa anyonya vyākarṣu tadāgrabodhaye //
S04bsu036_u:388: Saddhp_1.89 teṣāṃ ca buddhāna paraṃpareṇa dīpaṃkaraḥ paścimako abhūṣi /
S04bsu036_u:390: Saddhp_1.90 yaścāsi tasyo sugatātmajasya varaprabhasyo tada dharma bhāṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:391: śiṣyaḥ kusīdaśca sa lolupātmā lābhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:392: Saddhp_1.91 yaśorthikaścāpyatimātra āsīt kulākulaṃ ca pratipannamāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:393: uddeśa svādhyāyu tathāsya sarvo na tiṣṭhate bhāṣitu tasmi kāle //
S04bsu036_u:394: Saddhp_1.92 nāmaṃ ca tasyo imamevamāsīd yaśakāmanāmnā diśatāsu viśrutaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:396: Saddhp_1.93 ārāgayī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ pūjāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāmakārṣīt /

S04bsu036_u:492_1: cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya ātmanā ca dharmasaṃśayaprāptastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat

S04bsu036_u:560_1: pañcamātrāṇi sahasrāṇyutthāya āsanebhyo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā tataḥ

S04bsu036_u:581: ekakṛtyena śāriputra ekakaraṇīyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate mahākṛtyena mahākaraṇīyena /
S04bsu036_u:582: katamaṃ ca śāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyaṃ yena kṛtyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate?
S04bsu036_u:583: yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /

S04bsu036_u:586: tathāgatajñānapratibodhanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /

S04bsu036_u:982_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:983: tasyāpi śāriputra padmavṛṣabhavikrāmiṇastathāgatasya evaṃrūpameva buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:984: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:985: tatastasya tasmin saddharme kṣīṇe dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmapratirūpakaḥ sthāsyati //
S04bsu036_u:986: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:987: bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:988: Saddhp_3.23 bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:991: Saddhp_3.24 bahubuddhakoṭīṣu karitva satkriyāṃ caryābalaṃ tatra upārjayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:992: utpādayitvā ca daśo balāni spṛśiṣyase uttamamagrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:993: Saddhp_3.25 acintiye aparimitasmi kalpe prabhūtaratnastada kalpu bheṣyati /

S04bsu036_u:1001: Saddhp_3.29 sama dvādaśā antarakalpa tasya bhaviṣyate āyu tadā jinasya /
S04bsu036_u:1002: manujānapī antarakalpa aṣṭa āyuṣpramāṇaṃ tahi teṣa bheṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:1003: Saddhp_3.30 parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya dvātriṃśatiṃ antarakalpa pūrṇām /
S04bsu036_u:1004: saddharma saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:1005: Saddhp_3.31 saddharmi kṣīṇe pratirūpako 'sya dvātriṃśatī antarakalpa sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:1006: śarīravaistārika tasya tāyinaḥ susatkṛto naramarutaiśca nityam //
S04bsu036_u:1007: Saddhp_3.32 etādṛśaḥ so bhagavān bhaviṣyati prahṛṣṭa tvaṃ śārisutā bhavasva /
S04bsu036_u:1008: tvameva so tādṛśako bhaviṣyasi anābhibhūto dvipadānamuttamaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1009_2: saṃmukhaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ svakasvakaiścīvarairbhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1010: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiranyāśca devaputraśatasahasrakoṭyo bhagavantaṃ divyairvastrairabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1013: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇi dundubhayaścoparyantarīkṣe parāhananti sma /
S04bsu036_u:1014: mahāntaṃ ca puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayitvā evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante sma - pūrvaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāmṛṣipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:1015: idaṃ punarbhagavatā adya anuttaraṃ dvitīyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:1016: te ca devaputrāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:1019: Saddhp_3.34 prathamaṃ pravartitaṃ tatra dvitīyamiha nāyaka /
S04bsu036_u:1025: Saddhp_3.37 vayamapyedṛśāḥ syāmo buddhā loke anuttarāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1030: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - niṣkāṅkṣo 'smi bhagavan vigatakathaṃkatho bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamidamātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:1031_0: yāni ca imāni bhagavan dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni bhagavatā pūrvaṃ śaikṣabhūmau sthāpitāni
S04bsu036_u:1031_1: evamavavaditāni evamanuśiṣṭānyabhūvan etatparyavasāno me bhikṣavo dharmavinayo yadidaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1032_0: ime ca bhagavan dve bhikṣusahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ sarveṣāmātmadṛṣṭibhavadṛṣṭivibhavadṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivivarjitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:1034: tatsādhu bhagavān bhāṣatāmeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyavinodanārtha yathā bhagavannetāścatasraḥ parṣado niṣkāṅkṣā nirvicikitsā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1035_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nanu te mayā śāriputra pūrvamevākhyātaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1035_2: sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:1037: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra aupamyaṃ te kariṣyāmi asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśanārtham /
S04bsu036_u:1040_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra iha syāt kasmiṃścideva grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade
S04bsu036_u:1040_1: vā janapadapradeśe vā rāṣṭre vā rājadhānyāṃ vā gṛhapatirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako 'bhyatītavayo
S04bsu036_u:1041: mahaccāsya niveśanaṃ bhaveducchritaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca cirakṛtaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca dvayorvā trayāṇāṃ vā caturṇāṃ vā pañcānāṃ vā prāṇiśatānāmāvāsaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1047: tacca sahasaiva mahātāgniskandhena sarvapārśveṣu sarvāvantaṃ niveśanaṃ pradīptaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1048: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ kumārakāḥ syuḥ pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā /
S04bsu036_u:1050: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣastaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ mahātāgniskandhena samantāt
S04bsu036_u:1052: evaṃ cānuvicintayet - pratibalo 'hamanena mahatāgniskandhenāsaṃspṛṣṭo 'paridagdhaḥ kṣiprameva svastinā asmād gṛhādādīptād dvāreṇa nirgantuṃ nirdhāvitum /
S04bsu036_u:1053: api tu ya ime mamaiva putrā bālakāḥ kumārakā asminneva niveśane ādīpte taistaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
S04bsu036_u:1054: imaṃ cāgāramādīptaṃ na jānanti na budhyante na vidanti na cetayanti nodvegamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1055: saṃtapyamānā apyanena mahatāgniskandhena mahatā ca duḥkhaskandhena spṛṣṭāḥ samānā na duḥkhaṃ manasi kurvanti,
S04bsu036_u:1058: sa ca śāriputra puruṣo balavān bhaved bāhubalikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1060: yannvahaṃ sarvānimān kumārakānekapiṇḍayitvā utsaṅgenādāya asmād gṛhānnirgamayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1061: sa punarevamanuvicintayet - idaṃ khalu niveśanamekapraveśaṃ saṃvṛtadvārameva /
S04bsu036_u:1066: iti pratisaṃkhyāya tān kumārakānāmantrayate sma - āgacchata bhavantaḥ kumārakāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1071: atha khalu te kumārakā evaṃ tasya hitakāmasya puruṣasya tadbhāṣitaṃ nāvabudhyante nodvijanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1073: nāpi jānanti na vijānanti kimetadādīptaṃ nāmeti /
S04bsu036_u:1078: atha khalu sa puruṣa evamanuvicintayet - ādīptamidaṃ niveśanaṃ mahatāgniskandhena saṃpradīptam /
S04bsu036_u:1079: mā haivāhaṃ ceme ca kumārakā ihaivānena mahātāgniskandhena anayavyasanamāpatsyāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:1083: teṣāṃ ca kumārakāṇāmanekavidhānyanekāni krīḍanakāni bhaveyurvividhāni ca ramaṇīyakānīṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manaāpāni,
S04bsu036_u:1085: atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayaṃ jānaṃstān kumārakānetadavocat - yāni tāni kumārakā yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakānyāścaryādbhutāni,
S04bsu036_u:1090: tāni ca mayā sarvāṇi bahinirveśanadvāre sthāpitāni yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanahetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1092: ahaṃ vo yasya yasya yenārtho yena prayojanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:1096_0: atha khalu te kumārakāsteṣāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ ramaṇīyakānāmarthāya yathepsitānāṃ yathāsaṃkalpitānāmiṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:1096_1: kāntānāṃ priyāṇāṃ manaāpānāṃ nāmadheyāni śrutvā tasmādādīptādagārāt kṣipramevārabdhavīryā
S04bsu036_u:1096_2: balavatā javena anyonyamapratīkṣamāṇāḥ kaḥ prathamaṃ kaḥ prathamataramityanyonyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1097: atha sa puruṣaḥ kṣemasvastinā tān kumārakān nirgatān dṛṣṭvā abhayaprāptāniti viditvā ākāśe grāmacatvare upaviṣṭaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto nirupādāno vigatanīvaraṇo 'bhayaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1098: atha khalu te kumārakā yena sa pitā tenopasaṃkrāman,
S04bsu036_u:1099: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadeyuḥ - dehi nastāta tāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyāni /
S04bsu036_u:1101_0: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣasteṣāṃ svakānāṃ putrāṇāṃ vātajavasaṃpannān [Vaidya_53]
S04bsu036_u:1104: tathā hi śāriputra sa puruṣa āḍhyaśca bhavenmahādhanaśca prabhūtakoṣṭhāgāraśca /
S04bsu036_u:1105: sa evaṃ manyeta - alaṃ ma eṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmanyairyānairdattairiti /
S04bsu036_u:1110: samaṃ ca mayaite kumārakāḥ sarve cintayitavyā na viṣamam /
S04bsu036_u:1114: te ca dārakāstasmin samaye teṣu mahāyāneṣvabhiruhya āścaryādbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1115: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra mā haiva tasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ syāt,
S04bsu036_u:1116: yena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścātsarveṣāṃ mahāyānānyeva dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:1120: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhaved yattena puruṣeṇopāyakauśalyena te dārakāstasmādādīptād gṛhānniṣkāsitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1124: yadyapi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekarathamapi na dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:1125: tathāpi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1127: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa pūrvameva evamanuvicintitam - upāyakauśalyena ahamimān kumārakāṃstasmānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:1128: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1129: kaḥ punarvādo yattena puruṣeṇa prabhūtakośakoṣṭhāgāramastīti kṛtvā putrapriyatāmeva manyamānena ślāghamānenaikavarṇānyekayānāni dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:1132: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
S04bsu036_u:1139: sa utpannaḥ samānaḥ paśyati sattvān dahyataḥ pacyamānāṃstapyamānān paritapyamānān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1140: paribhoganimittaṃ ca kāmahetunidānaṃ ca anekāvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:1141: dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ ca paryeṣṭinidānaṃ parigrahanidānaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokeṣvanekavidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:1143_0: tatraiva ca duḥkhaskandhe parivartamānāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti notrasanti
S04bsu036_u:1143_1: na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante na budhyante na cetayanti nodvijanti na niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
S04bsu036_u:1146: tena ca mahatā duḥkhaskandhena abhyāhatā na duḥkhamanasikārasaṃjñāmutpādayanti //
S04bsu036_u:1147: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - ahaṃ khalveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pitā /
S04bsu036_u:1148: mayā hyete sattvā asmādevaṃrūpānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1152: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - sacedahaṃ jñānabalo 'smīti kṛtvā ṛddhibalo 'smīti kṛtvā anupāyenaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānabalavaiśāradyāni saṃśrāvayeyam,
S04bsu036_u:1155: adhyavasitā hyamī sattvāḥ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣu traidhātukaratyām /
S04bsu036_u:1159: tatra śāriputra tathāgato yadyathāpi nāma sa puruṣo bāhubalikaḥ sthāpayitvā bāhubalam,
S04bsu036_u:1161: niṣkāsayitvā sa teṣāṃ paścādudārāṇi mahāyānāni dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:1163: upāyakauśalyajñānenādīptajīrṇapaṭalaśaraṇaniveśanasadṛśāt traidhātukāt sattvānāṃ niṣkāsanahetostrīṇi yānānyupadarśayati yadut śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
S04bsu036_u:1165: evaṃ caiṣāṃ vadati - mā bhavanto 'sminnādīptāgārasadṛśe traidhātuke 'bhiramadhvaṃ hīneṣu rūpaśabdagandharasasparśeṣu /
S04bsu036_u:1166: atra hi yūyaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiratāḥ pañcakāmaguṇasahagatayā tṛṣṇayā dahyatha tapyatha paritapyatha /
S04bsu036_u:1168: trīṇi yānānyanuprāpsyatha yadidaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
S04bsu036_u:1172: evaṃ caitāṃllobhayāmi - etāni bhoḥ sattvā yāni āryāṇi ca āryapraśastāni ca mahāramaṇīyakasamanvāgatāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:1177: tatra śāriputra ye sattvāḥ paṇḍitajātīyā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:1182: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā mṛgarathamākāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1183: anye sattvā anācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ damaśamathamākāṅkṣamāṇā ātmaparinirvāṇahetorhetupratyayānubodhāya tathāgataśāsane 'bhiyujyante,
S04bsu036_u:1185: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā ajarathamāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1186_0: apare punaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamanācāryakaṃ jñānamākāṅkṣamāṇā
S04bsu036_u:1186_1: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
S04bsu036_u:1190_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sa puruṣastān kumārakāṃstasmādādīptādagārānnirdhāvitān
S04bsu036_u:1190_1: dṛṣṭvā kṣemasvastibhyāṃ parimuktānabhayaprāptāniti viditvā ātmānaṃ ca mahādhanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1191_0: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā paśyati - anekāḥ sattvakoṭīstraidhātukāt
S04bsu036_u:1193_0: tānetān śāriputra tasmin samaye tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prabhūto mahājñānabalavaiśāradyakośa
S04bsu036_u:1193_1: iti viditvā sarve caite mamaiva putrā iti jñātvā buddhayānenaiva tān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:1194: na ca kasyacit sattvasya pratyātmikaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadati /
S04bsu036_u:1197: ye cāpi te śāriputra sattvāstraidhātukāt parimuktā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:1198: teṣāṃ tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīrāryāṇi paramasukhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakāni dadāti,
S04bsu036_u:1200: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1201_0: yena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā teṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekameva mahāyānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dattaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1201_1: saptaratnamayaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitamekavarṇameva udārayānameva sarveṣāmagrayānameva dattaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1202: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho na mṛṣāvādī bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:1203: yena pūrvamupāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścānmahāyānenaiva sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:1205: tathāgato hi śāriputra prabhūtajñānabalavaiśāradyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamanvāgataḥ pratibalaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvajñajñānasahagataṃ [Vaidya_56] dharmamupadarśayitum /
S04bsu036_u:1208: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:1209: Saddhp_3.39 yathā hi puruṣasya bhavedagāraṃ jīrṇaṃ mahantaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1210: viśīrṇa prāsādu tathā bhaveta stambhāśca mūleṣu bhaveyu pūtikāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1211: Saddhp_3.40 gavākṣaharmyā galitaikadeśā viśīrṇa kuḍayaṃ kaṭalepanaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1212: jīrṇu pravṛddhoddhṛtavedikaṃ ca tṛṇacchadaṃ sarvata opatantam //

S04bsu036_u:1449_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca
S04bsu036_u:1449_1: mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ imamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamāyuṣmataśca
S04bsu036_u:1449_2: śāriputrasya vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā
S04bsu036_u:1450_0: upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena
S04bsu036_u:1450_2: praṇatakāyāstasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocan - vayaṃ hi bhagavan jīrṇā vṛddhā
S04bsu036_u:1450_3: mahallakā asmin bhikṣusaṃghe sthavirasaṃmatā jarājīrṇībhūtā nirvāṇaprāptāḥ sma iti

S04bsu036_u:1457: tato vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavato dharmaṃ deśayamānasya śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ sarvamāviṣkurmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1458: nāsmābhireṣu buddhadharmeṣu buddhakṣetravyūheṣu vā bodhisattvavikrīḍiteṣu vā tathāgatavikrīḍiteṣu vā spṛhotpāditā /

S04bsu036_u:1466: bhagavannadya sahasaivemamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ tathāgataghoṣaṃ śrutvā mahāratnapratilabdhāśca smaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1468: bhagavan amārgitamaparyeṣṭamacintitamaprārthitaṃ cāsmābhirbhagavannidamevaṃ rūpaṃ mahāratnaṃ pratilabdham /
S04bsu036_u:1471: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ piturantikādapakrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1473: sa tatra bahūni varṣāṇi vipravased viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā /
S04bsu036_u:1474: atha sa bhagavan mahān puruṣo bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1476: sa ca vṛttiṃ paryeṣamāṇa āhāracīvarahetordiśo vidiśaḥ prakāman anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:1477: tasya ca sa pitā anyatamaṃ janapadaṃ prakrāntaḥ syāt /
S04bsu036_u:1488: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣasya pitā bahudhanahiraṇyakośakoṣṭhāgārastasmin nagare vasamānastaṃ pañcāśadvarṣanaṣṭaṃ putraṃ satatasamitamanusmaret /

S04bsu036_u:1495: sa taṃ punaḥ punaḥ putramanusmaret - aho nāmāhaṃ nirvṛtiprāpto bhaveyaṃ yadi me sa putra imaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ paribhuñjīta //
S04bsu036_u:1496_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena tasya
S04bsu036_u:1497_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa tasya daridrapuruṣasya pitā svake niveśanadvāre mahatyā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrapariṣadā
S04bsu036_u:1497_1: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto mahāsiṃhāsane sapādapīṭhe suvarṇarūpyapratimaṇḍite upaviṣṭo hiraṇyakoṭīśatasahasrairvyavahāraṃ
S04bsu036_u:1497_2: kurvan vālavyajanena vījyamāno vitatavitāne pṛthivīpradeśe muktakusumābhikīrṇe ratnadāmābhipralambite
S04bsu036_u:1498: adrākṣīt sa bhagavan daridrapuruṣastaṃ svakaṃ pitaraṃ svake niveśanadvāre evaṃrūpayā ṛdhyā upaviṣṭaṃ mahatā janakāyena parivṛtaṃ gṛhapatikṛtyaṃ kurvāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:1499: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvignamānasaḥ evamanuvicintayāmāsa - sahasaivāyaṃ mayā rājā vā rājamātro vā āsāditaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1506: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo duḥkhaparaṃparāmanasikārabhayabhītastvaramāṇaḥ prakrāmet palāyet,
S04bsu036_u:1508: atha khalu bhagavan sa āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ svake niveśanadvāre siṃhāsane upaviṣṭastaṃ svakaṃ putraṃ sahadarśanenaiva pratyabhijānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:1509: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1510: evaṃ ca cintayet - āścaryaṃ yāvad yatra hi nāma asya mahato hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya paribhoktā upalabdhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1514: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ putratṛṣṇāsaṃpīḍitastasmin kṣaṇalavamuhūrte javanān puruṣān saṃpreṣayet - gacchata mārṣā etaṃ puruṣaṃ śīghramānayadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:1515: atha khalu bhagavaṃste puruṣāḥ rsava eva javena pradhāvitāstaṃ daridrapuruṣamadhyālambeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1516: atha khalu daridrapuruṣastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvigramānaso dāruṇamārtasvaraṃ muñcedāraved viravet /
S04bsu036_u:1518: atha khalu te puruṣā balātkāreṇa taṃ [Vaidya_73] daridrapuruṣaṃ viravantamapyākarṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1519: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣo bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna udvignamānasa evaṃ ca cintayet - mā tāvadahaṃ vadhyo daṇḍayo bhaveyam /
S04bsu036_u:1524: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti /
S04bsu036_u:1525: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet /
S04bsu036_u:1529: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet - mamaiṣa putra iti /
S04bsu036_u:1530: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:1531: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:1533: evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1534: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:1536: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1537: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1539: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau - gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo 'sau puruṣa ihāgato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:1540: taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām /
S04bsu036_u:1541: sacet sa evaṃ vadet - kiṃ karma kartavyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:1542: sa yuvābhyāmevaṃ vaktavyaḥ - saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ sahāvābhyāmiti /
S04bsu036_u:1543: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām /
S04bsu036_u:1544: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1545: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1546: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam /
S04bsu036_u:1548: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
S04bsu036_u:1551: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1556: enaṃ vadet - ihaiva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa karma kuruṣva /
S04bsu036_u:1559: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1561: yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena /
S04bsu036_u:1566: yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa pariṣkāreṇa,
S04bsu036_u:1574: mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā /
S04bsu036_u:1575: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ, karoṣi vā /
S04bsu036_u:1576: sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
S04bsu036_u:1577: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante /
S04bsu036_u:1580: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt /
S04bsu036_u:1582: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:1583: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
S04bsu036_u:1585: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1586: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet /
S04bsu036_u:1587: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:1590: icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1595: mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi //
S04bsu036_u:1596: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo 'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:1602_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā
S04bsu036_u:1602_1: avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1602_2: jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato
S04bsu036_u:1602_3: jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1603: ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1615: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1616: evaṃ ca vicintayet - sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti //
S04bsu036_u:1619: tathāgataśca asmākamevaṃ vadati - putrā mama yūyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:1625: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1627: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1628: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1629: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā /
S04bsu036_u:1637: tata evaṃ jānīma - etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:1638: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1643: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1646: yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti,
S04bsu036_u:1650: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1655: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04bsu036_u:1656: Saddhp_4.1 āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
S04bsu036_u:1657: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya //
S04bsu036_u:1661: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve //
S04bsu036_u:1662: Saddhp_4.3 yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1663: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram //
S04bsu036_u:1664: Saddhp_4.4 pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
S04bsu036_u:1665: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni //
S04bsu036_u:1666: Saddhp_4.5 tathā ca so putra gaveṣamāṇo anyaṃ mahantaṃ nagaraṃ hi gatvā /
S04bsu036_u:1667: niveśanaṃ māpiya tatra tiṣṭhet samarpito kāmugaṇehi pañcabhiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1668: Saddhp_4.6 bahuṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyaṃ dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālam /
S04bsu036_u:1669: hastī ca aśvāśca padātayaśca gāvaḥ paśūścaiva tathaiḍakāśca //
S04bsu036_u:1670: Saddhp_4.7 prayoga āyoga tathaiva kṣetrā dāsī ca dāsā bahu preṣyavargaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1671: susatkṛtaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭibhī rājñaśca so vallabhu nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:1672: Saddhp_4.8 kṛtāñjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarā grāmeṣu ye cāpi vasanti grāmiṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1673: bahuvāṇijāstasya vrajanti antike bahūhi kāryehi kṛtādhikārāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1674: Saddhp_4.9 etādṛśo ṛddhimato naraḥ syājjīrṇaśca vṛddhaśca mahallakaśca /
S04bsu036_u:1675: sa putraśokaṃ anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:1676: Saddhp_4.10 sa tādṛśo durmati mahya putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1677: ayaṃ ca kośo vipulo mamāsti kālakriyā co mama pratyupasthitā //
S04bsu036_u:1678: Saddhp_4.11 so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro daridrakaḥ kṛpaṇaku nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:1679: grāmeṇa grāmaṃ anucaṃkramantaḥ paryeṣate bhakta athāpi colam //
S04bsu036_u:1680: Saddhp_4.12 paryeṣamāṇo 'pi kadāci kiṃcillabheta kiṃcit puna naiva kiṃcit /
S04bsu036_u:1681: sa śuṣyate paraśaraṇeṣu bālo dadrūya kaṇḍūya ca digdhagātraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1682: Saddhp_4.13 so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā anupūrvaśo tatra gato bhaveta /
S04bsu036_u:1683: bhaktaṃ ca colaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇo niveśanaṃ yatra pituḥ svakasya //
S04bsu036_u:1684: Saddhp_4.14 so cāpi āḍhyaḥ puruṣo mahādhano dvārasmi siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1686: Saddhp_4.15 āpto janaścāsya samantataḥ sthito dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca gaṇenti kecit /
S04bsu036_u:1687: kecittu lekhānapi lekhayanti kecit prayogaṃ ca prayojayanti //
S04bsu036_u:1688: Saddhp_4.16 so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitaṃ gṛhapatino niveśanam /
S04bsu036_u:1689: kahiṃ nu adya ahamatra āgato rājā ayaṃ bheṣyati rājamātraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1690: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1691: Saddhp_4.17 mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1693: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naro daridravīthīṃ paripṛcchamānaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1694: Saddhp_4.18 so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsanasthaśca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1695: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etaṃ puruṣaṃ daridram //
S04bsu036_u:1696: Saddhp_4.19 samanantaraṃ tehi gṛhītu so naro gṛhītamātro 'tha ca mūrccha gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:1697: dhrūvaṃ khu mahyaṃ vadhakā upasthitāḥ kiṃ mahya colenatha bhojanena vā //
S04bsu036_u:1698: Saddhp_4.20 dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī hīnādhimukto ayu bāla durmatiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1699: na śraddadhī mahyamimāṃ vibhūṣitāṃ pitā mamāyaṃ ti na cāpi śraddadhīt //
S04bsu036_u:1700: Saddhp_4.21 puruṣāṃśca so tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāśca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
S04bsu036_u:1701: kucelakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīnasattvāḥ paryeṣathā taṃ naru karmakārakam //
S04bsu036_u:1702: Saddhp_4.22 saṃkāradhānaṃ imu mahya pūtikamuccāraprasrāvavināśitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1703: taṃ śodhanārthāya karohi karma dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ pradāsye //
S04bsu036_u:1704: Saddhp_4.23 etādṛśaṃ ghoṣa śruṇitva so naro āgatya saṃśodhayi taṃ pradeśam /
S04bsu036_u:1706: Saddhp_4.24 so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed gavākṣaolokanake 'pi nityam /
S04bsu036_u:1707: hīnādhimukto ayu mahya putraḥ saṃkāradhānaṃ śucikaṃ karoti //
S04bsu036_u:1708: Saddhp_4.25 sa otaritvā piṭakaṃ gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā /
S04bsu036_u:1709: upasaṃkramettasya narasya antike avabhartsayanto na karotha karma //
S04bsu036_u:1710: Saddhp_4.26 dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ dadāmi dviguṇāṃ ca bhūyastatha pādamrakṣaṇam /
S04bsu036_u:1711: saloṇabhaktaṃ ca dadāmi tubhya śākaṃ ca śāṭiṃ ca punardadāmi //
S04bsu036_u:1712: Saddhp_4.27 evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle saṃśleṣayettaṃ punareva paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1713: suṣṭhuṃ khalū karma karoṣi atra putro 'si vyaktaṃ mama nātra saṃśayaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1714: Saddhp_4.28 sa stokastokaṃ ca gṛhaṃ praveśayet karmaṃ ca kārāpayi taṃ manuṣyam /
S04bsu036_u:1715: viṃśacca varṣāṇi supūritāni krameṇa viśrambhayi taṃ naraṃ saḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1716: Saddhp_4.29 hiraṇyu so mauktiku sphāṭikaṃ ca pratisāmayettatra niveśanasmin /
S04bsu036_u:1717: sarvaṃ ca so saṃgaṇanāṃ karoti arthaṃ ca sarvaṃ anucintayeta //
S04bsu036_u:1718: Saddhp_4.30 bahirdhā so tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya eko vasamānu bālaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1719: daridracintāmanucintayeta na me 'sti etādṛśa bhoga kecit //
S04bsu036_u:1720: Saddhp_4.31 jñātvā ca so tasya imevarūpamudārasaṃjñābhigato mi putraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1723: Saddhp_4.32 rājāna so naigamanāgarāṃśca samānayitvā bahuvāṇijāṃśca /
S04bsu036_u:1725: uvāca evaṃ pariṣāya madhye putro mamāyaṃ cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1726: Saddhp_4.33 pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca 'to viṃśatiye mi dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1727: amukātu nagarātu mamaiṣa naṣṭo ahaṃ ca mārganta ihaivamāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1728: Saddhp_4.34 sarvasya dravyasya ayaṃ prabhurme etasya niryātayi sarvaśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1729: karotu kāryaṃ ca piturdhanena sarvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ ca dadāmi etat //
S04bsu036_u:1730: Saddhp_4.35 āścaryaprāptaśca bhavennaro 'sau daridrabhāvaṃ purimaṃ smaritvā /
S04bsu036_u:1731: hīnādhimuktiṃ ca pituśca tān guṇāṃllabdhvā kuṭumbaṃ sukhito 'smi adya //
S04bsu036_u:1732: Saddhp_4.36 tathaiva cāsmāka vināyakena hīnādhimuktitva vijāniyāna /
S04bsu036_u:1733: na śrāvitaṃ buddha bhaviṣyatheti yūyaṃ kila śrāvaka mahya putrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1734: Saddhp_4.37 asmāṃśca adhyeṣati lokanātho ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:1735: teṣāṃ vade kāśyapa mārga nuttaraṃ yaṃ mārga bhāvitva bhaveyu buddhāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1736: Saddhp_4.38 vayaṃ ca teṣāṃ sugatena preṣitā bahubodhisattvāna mahābalānām /
S04bsu036_u:1738: Saddhp_4.39 śrutvā ca asmāku jinasya putrā bodhāya bhāventi sumārgamagryam /
S04bsu036_u:1739: te vyākriyante ca kṣaṇasmi tasmin bhaviṣyathā buddha imasmi loke //
S04bsu036_u:1740: Saddhp_4.40 etādṛśaṃ karma karoma tāyinaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇā ima dharmakośam /
S04bsu036_u:1741: prakāśayantaśca jinātmajānāṃ vaiśvāsikastasya yathā naraḥ saḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1742: Saddhp_4.41 daridracintāśca vicintayāma viśrāṇayanto imu buddhakośam /
S04bsu036_u:1743: na caiva prārthema jinasya jñānaṃ jinasya jñānaṃ ca prakāśayāmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1744: Saddhp_4.42 pratyātmikīṃ nirvṛti kalpayāma etāvatā jñānamidaṃ na bhūyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1745: nāsmāka harṣo 'pi kadācia bhoti kṣetreṣu buddhāna śruṇitva vyūhān //
S04bsu036_u:1746: Saddhp_4.43 śāntāḥ kilā sarvimi dharmanāsravā nirodhautpādavivarjitāśca /
S04bsu036_u:1747: na cātra kaścidbhavatīha dharmo evaṃ tu cintetva na bhoti śraddhā //
S04bsu036_u:1748: Saddhp_4.44 suniḥspṛhā smā vaya dīrgharātraṃ bauddhasya jñānasya anuttarasya /
S04bsu036_u:1749: praṇidhānamasmāka na jātu tatra iyaṃ parā niṣṭha jinena uktā //
S04bsu036_u:1750: Saddhp_4.45 nirvāṇaparyanti samucchraye 'smin paribhāvitā śūnyata dīrgharātram /
S04bsu036_u:1751: parimukta traidhātukaduḥkhapīḍitāḥ kṛtaṃ ca asmābhi jinasya śāsanam //
S04bsu036_u:1752: Saddhp_4.46 yaṃ hi prakāśema jinātmajānāṃ ye prasthitā bhonti ihāgrabodhau /
S04bsu036_u:1753: teṣāṃ ca yatkiṃci vadāma dharmaṃ spṛha tatra asmāka na jātu bhoti //
S04bsu036_u:1754: Saddhp_4.47 taṃ cāsma lokācariyaḥ svayaṃbhūrupekṣate kālamavekṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1756: Saddhp_4.48 upāyakauśalya yathaiva tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasya kāle /
S04bsu036_u:1757: hīnādhimuktaṃ satataṃ dameti damiyāna cāsmai pradadāti vittam //
S04bsu036_u:1758: Saddhp_4.49 suduṣkaraṃ kurvati lokanātho upāyakauśalya prakāśayantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1759: hīnādhimuktān damayantu putrān dametva ca jñānamidaṃ dadāti //
S04bsu036_u:1760: Saddhp_4.50 āścaryaprāptāḥ sahasā sma adya yathā daridro labhiyāna vittam /
S04bsu036_u:1761: phalaṃ ca prāptaṃ iha buddhāśāsane prathamaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:1762: Saddhp_4.51 yacchīlamasmābhi ca dīrgharātraṃ saṃrakṣitaṃ lokavidusya śāsane /
S04bsu036_u:1763: asmābhi labdhaṃ phalamadya tasya śīlasya pūrvaṃ caritasya nātha //
S04bsu036_u:1764: Saddhp_4.52 yad brahmacaryaṃ paramaṃ viśuddhaṃ niṣevitaṃ śāsani nāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:1765: tasyo viśiṣṭaṃ phalamadya labdhaṃ śāntaṃ udāraṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:1766: Saddhp_4.53 adyo vayaṃ śrāvakabhūta nātha saṃśrāvayiṣyāmatha cāgrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:1767: bodhīya śabdaṃ ca prakāśayāmasteno vayaṃ śrāvaka bhīṣmakalpāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1768: Saddhp_4.54 arhantabhūtā vayamadya nātha arhāmahe pūja sadevakātaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1769: lokātsamārātu sabrahmakātaḥ sarveṣa sattvāna ca antikātaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1770: Saddhp_4.55 ko nāma śaktaḥ pratikartu tubhyamudyuktarūpo bahukalpakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1772: Saddhp_4.56 hastehi pādehi śireṇa cāpi pratipriyaṃ duṣkarakaṃ hi kartum /
S04bsu036_u:1773: śireṇa aṃsena ca yo dhareta paripūrṇakalpān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1774: Saddhp_4.57 khādyaṃ dadedbhojanavastrapānaṃ śayanāsanaṃ co vimalottaracchadam /
S04bsu036_u:1775: vihāra kārāpayi candanāmayān saṃstīrya co dūṣyayugehi dadyāt //
S04bsu036_u:1776: Saddhp_4.58 gilānabhaiṣajya bahuprakāraṃ pūjārtha dadyāt sugatasya nityam /
S04bsu036_u:1777: dadeya kalpān yatha gaṅgavālikā naivaṃ kadācit pratikartu śakyam //
S04bsu036_u:1778: Saddhp_4.59 mahātmadharmā atulānubhāvā maharddhikāḥ kṣāntibale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1779: buddhā mahārāja anāsravā jinā sahanti bālāna imīdṛśāni //
S04bsu036_u:1780: Saddhp_4.60 anuvartamānastatha nityakālaṃ nimittacārīṇa bravīti dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:1782: Saddhp_4.61 pratipatti darśeti bahuprakāraṃ sattvāna sthānāni prajānamānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1783: nānādhimuktiṃ ca viditva teṣāṃ hetūsahasrehi bravīti dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:1784: Saddhp_4.62 tathāgataścarya prajānamānaḥ sarveṣa sattvānatha pudgalānām /
S04bsu036_u:1785: bahuprakāraṃ hi bravīti dharmaṃ nidarśayanto imamagrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:1790: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapaṃ tāṃścānyān sthavirān mahāśrāvakānāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu mahākāśyapa /
S04bsu036_u:1791: sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtān guṇavarṇān bhāṣadhve /
S04bsu036_u:1792: ete ca kāśyapa tathāgatasya bhūtā guṇāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1794: yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ paryanto 'dhigantumaparimitānapi kalpān bhāṣamāṇaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1797: yaṃ ca kāśyapa tathāgato dharmaṃ yatropanikṣipati,
S04bsu036_u:1804_0: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāvantastṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo
S04bsu036_u:1804_1: nānāvarṇā nānāprakārā oṣadhigrāmā nānānāmadheyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātāḥ parvatagirikandareṣu vā /
S04bsu036_u:1807: saṃchādya ca sarvatra samakālaṃ vāri pramuñcet /
S04bsu036_u:1810: sarve te tato mahāmeghapramuktādvāriṇo yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayamabdhātuṃ pratyāpibanti /
S04bsu036_u:1811: te caikarasena vāriṇā prabhūtena meghapramuktena yathābījamanvayaṃ vivṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāmāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1813: te ca pṛthak pṛthagū nānānāmadheyāni pratilabhante /
S04bsu036_u:1814: ekadharaṇīpratiṣṭhitāśca te sarve oṣadhigrāmā bījagrāmā ekarasatoyābhiṣyanditāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1815: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
S04bsu036_u:1817: tathā tathāgato 'pyutpadya sarvāvantaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ svareṇābhivijñāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:1818: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātumavacchādayati,
S04bsu036_u:1819: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata evaṃ śabdamudīrayati,
S04bsu036_u:1820: ghoṣamanuśrāvayati - tathāgato 'smi bhavanto devamanuṣyāḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1825: ahamimaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ samyak prajñayā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmi sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī /
S04bsu036_u:1828: tatra kāśyapa bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatasya dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti /
S04bsu036_u:1829: atha tathāgato 'pi teṣāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryaparāparavaimātratāṃ [Vaidya_85] jñātvā tāṃstān dharmaparyāyānupasaṃharati,
S04bsu036_u:1830: tāṃ tāṃ dharmakathāṃ kathayati bahvīṃ vicitrāṃ harṣaṇīyāṃ paritoṣaṇīyāṃ prāmodyakaraṇīyāṃ hitasukhasaṃvartanakaraṇīyām / yayā
S04bsu036_u:1831: kathaya te sattvāḥ dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:1835: śrutvā ca taṃ dharmaṃ vigatanīvaraṇā bhavanti /

S04bsu036_u:2754: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2755: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2756: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2757_0: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya
S04bsu036_u:2757_1: bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni
S04bsu036_u:2764: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni?
S04bsu036_u:2765: yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:2766: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate 'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:2769: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:2770: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
S04bsu036_u:2772: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:2776: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
S04bsu036_u:2777: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
S04bsu036_u:2778: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati /
S04bsu036_u:2779: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:2781: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām - dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
S04bsu036_u:2783: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram /
S04bsu036_u:2784: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:2785: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām /
S04bsu036_u:2787: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet - yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ - vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2790: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet - mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti /
S04bsu036_u:2792: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:2793: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa,
S04bsu036_u:2797: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam /
S04bsu036_u:2801: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ - muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt /
S04bsu036_u:2803: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:2807: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:2808: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2810: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti //
S04bsu036_u:2812: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yuṣmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca deśikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2814: paśyati - mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam /
S04bsu036_u:2815: mā khalvime ekameva buddhajñānaṃ śrutvā draveṇaiva pratinivartayeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:2818: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,
S04bsu036_u:2819: viśrāntānāṃ caiṣāmevaṃ kathayati - idaṃ khalu ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramiti,
S04bsu036_u:2820_0: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve
S04bsu036_u:2820_1: nirvāṇabhūmī sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārthaṃ deśayati saṃprakāśayati yadidaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S04bsu036_u:2821: yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ samaye te sattvāstatra sthitā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:2822: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyevaṃ saṃśrāvayati - na khalu punarbhikṣavo yūyaṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2826: api tu khalu punarūpāyakauśalyametad bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat trīṇi yānāni saṃprakāśayantīti //
S04bsu036_u:2827: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayopadarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:2828: Saddhp_7.60 abhijñajñānābhibhu lokanāyako yadbodhimaṇḍasmi niṣaṇṇa āsīt /
S04bsu036_u:2829: daśeha so antarakalpa pūrṇān na lapsi bodhiṃ paramārthadarśī //
S04bsu036_u:2830: Saddhp_7.61 devātha nāgā asurātha guhyakā udyukta pūjārtha jinasya tasya /
S04bsu036_u:2831: puṣpāṇa varṣaṃ pramumocu tatra buddhe ca bodhiṃ naranāyake 'smin //
S04bsu036_u:2832: Saddhp_7.62 upariṃ ca khe dundubhayo vineduḥ satkārapūjārtha jinasya tasya /
S04bsu036_u:2833: suduḥkhitā cāpi jinena tatra cirabudhyamānena anuttaraṃ padam //
S04bsu036_u:2834: Saddhp_7.63 daśāna co antarakalpa atyayāt spṛśe sa bodhiṃ bhagavānanābhibhūḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2835: hṛṣṭā udagrāstada āsu sarve devā manuṣyā bhujagāsurāśca //
S04bsu036_u:2836: vīrāḥ kumārā atha tasya ṣoḍaśa putrā guṇāḍhyā naranāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2837: Saddhp_7.64 vīrāḥ kumārā atha tasya ṣoḍaśa putrā guṇāḍhyā naranāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2840: Saddhp_7.65 vanditva pādau ca vināyakasya adhyeṣiṣū dharma prakāśayasva /
S04bsu036_u:2841: asmāṃśca tarpehi imaṃ ca lokaṃ subhāṣiteneha narendrasiṃha //
S04bsu036_u:2842: Saddhp_7.66 cirasya lokasya daśaddiśe 'smin vidito 'si utpannu mahāvināyaka /
S04bsu036_u:2844: Saddhp_7.67 diśāya pūrvāya sahasrakoṭyaḥ kṣetrāṇa pañcāśadabhūṣi kampitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2845: tatrāpi ye brāhma vimāna agrāste tejavanto adhimātramāsi //
S04bsu036_u:2847: puṣpairihābhyokiriyāṇa nāyakamarpenti te sarva vimāna tasya //
S04bsu036_u:2849: tūṣṇīṃ ca so āsi narendrarājā na tāva kālo mama dharma bhāṣitum //
S04bsu036_u:2850: Saddhp_7.70 evaṃ diśi dakṣiṇiyāṃ pi tatra atha paścimā heṣṭima uttarasyām /
S04bsu036_u:2851: upariṣṭimāyāṃ vidiśāsu caiva āgatya brahmāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2852: Saddhp_7.71 puṣpebhi abhyokiriyāṇa nāyakaṃ pādau ca vanditva vināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2856: Saddhp_7.73 adhyeṣaṇāṃ jñātva anantacakṣuḥ prakāśate dharma bahuprakāram /
S04bsu036_u:2857: catvāri satyāni ca vistareṇa pratītya sarve imi bhāva utthitāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2858: Saddhp_7.74 avidya ādīkariyāṇa cakṣumān prabhāṣate sa maraṇāntaduḥkham /
S04bsu036_u:2859: jātiprasūtā imi sarvadoṣā mṛtyuṃ ca mānuṣyamimeva jānatha //
S04bsu036_u:2860: Saddhp_7.75 samanantaraṃ bhāṣitu dharma tena bahuprakārā vividhā anantāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2861: śrutvānaśītī nayutāna koṭyaḥ sattvāḥ sthitāḥ śrāvaka bhūtale laghum //
S04bsu036_u:2862: Saddhp_7.76 kṣaṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ aparaṃ abhūṣi jinasya tasyo bahu dharma bhāṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2863: viśuddhasattvā yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ kṣaṇena te śrāvakabhūta āsīt //
S04bsu036_u:2864: Saddhp_7.77 tatottarī agaṇiyu tasya āsīt saṃghastadā lokavināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2865: kalpāna koṭīnyayutā gaṇenta ekaika no cāntu labheya teṣām //
S04bsu036_u:2866: Saddhp_7.78 ye cāpi te ṣoḍaśa rājaputrā ye aurasā cailakabhūta sarve /
S04bsu036_u:2867: te śrāmaṇerā avaciṃsu taṃ jinaṃ prakāśayā nāyaka agradharmam //
S04bsu036_u:2868: yathā vayaṃ lokavidū bhavema yathaiva tvaṃ sarvajinānamuttama /
S04bsu036_u:2869: Saddhp_7.79 yathā vayaṃ lokavidū bhavema yathaiva tvaṃ sarvajinānamuttama /
S04bsu036_u:2871: ime ca sattvā bhavi sarvi eva yathaiva tvaṃ vīra viśuddhacakṣuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2872: Saddhp_7.80 so cā jino āṃśayu jñātva teṣāṃ kumārabhūtāna tathātmajānām /
S04bsu036_u:2875: bhūtāṃ cariṃ darśayi lokanātho yathā caranto vidu bodhisattvāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2877: gāthāsahasrehi analpakehi yeṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2878: Saddhp_7.83 so cā jino bhāṣiya sūtrametadvihāru praviśitva vilakṣayīta /
S04bsu036_u:2880: Saddhp_7.84 te śrāmaṇerāśca viditva nāyakaṃ vihāri āsannamaniṣkramantam /
S04bsu036_u:2881: saṃśrāvayiṃsu bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ bauddha imaṃ jñānamanāsravaṃ śivam //
S04bsu036_u:2882: Saddhp_7.85 pṛthak pṛthagāsana prajñapitvā abhāṣi teṣāmidameva sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:2883: sugatasya tasya tada śāsanasmin adhikāra kurvanti mamevarūpam //
S04bsu036_u:2884: Saddhp_7.86 gaṅgā yathā vāluka aprameyā sahasra ṣaṣṭiṃ tada śrāvayiṃsu /
S04bsu036_u:2885: ekaiku tasya sugatasya putro vineti sattvāni analpakāni //
S04bsu036_u:2886: Saddhp_7.87 tasyo jinasya parinirvṛtasya caritva te paśyisu buddhakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2887: tehī tadā śrāvitakehi sārdhaṃ kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamānām //
S04bsu036_u:2888: Saddhp_7.88 caritva caryāṃ vipulāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ buddhā ca te bodhi daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu036_u:2889: te ṣoḍaśā tasya jinasya putrā diśāsu sarvāsu dvayo dvayo jināḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2890: Saddhp_7.89 ye cāpi saṃśrāvitakā tadāsī te śrāvakā teṣa jināna sarve /
S04bsu036_u:2892: Saddhp_7.90 ahaṃ pi abhyantari teṣa āsīnmayāpi saṃśrāvita sarvi yūyam /
S04bsu036_u:2893: teno mama śrāvaka yūyamadya bodhāvupāyeniha sarvi nemi //
S04bsu036_u:2894: Saddhp_7.91 ayaṃ khu hetustada pūrva āsīdayaṃ pratyayo yena hu dharma bhāṣe /
S04bsu036_u:2895: nayāmyahaṃ yena mamāgrabodhiṃ mā bhikṣavo utrasatheha sthāne //
S04bsu036_u:2896: Saddhp_7.92 yathāṭavī ugra bhaveya dāruṇā śūnyā nirālamba nirāśrayā ca /
S04bsu036_u:2897: bahuśvāpadā caiva apāniyā ca bālāna sā bhīṣaṇikā bhaveta //
S04bsu036_u:2898: Saddhp_7.93 purūṣāṇa co tatra sahasra nekā ye prasthitāstāmaṭavīṃ bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2899: aṭavī ca sā śūnya bhaveta dīrghā pūrṇāni pañcāśata yojanāni //
S04bsu036_u:2900: Saddhp_7.94 puruṣaśca āḍhyaḥ smṛtimantu vyakto dhīro vinītaśca viśāradaśca /
S04bsu036_u:2901: yo deśikasteṣa bhaveta tatra aṭavīya durgāya subhairavāya //
S04bsu036_u:2902: Saddhp_7.95 te cāpi khinnā bahuprāṇikoṭya uvāca taṃ deśika tasmi kāle /
S04bsu036_u:2903: khinnā vayaṃ ārya na śaknuyāma nivartanaṃ adyiha rocate naḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2904: Saddhp_7.96 kuśalaśca so pi tada paṇḍitaśca praṇāyakopāya tadā vicintayet /
S04bsu036_u:2905: dhikkaṣṭa ratnairimi sarvi bālā bhraśyanti ātmāna nivartayantaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2906: Saddhp_7.97 yannūnahaṃ ṛddhibalena vādya nagaraṃ mahantaṃ abhinirmiṇeyam /
S04bsu036_u:2908: Saddhp_7.98 vāpī nadīyo abhinirmiṇeyam ārāmapuṣpaiḥ pratimaṇḍitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:2910: Saddhp_7.99 nirmāṇu kṛtva iti tān vadeya mā bhāyathā harṣa karotha caiva /
S04bsu036_u:2911: prāptā bhavanto nagaraṃ variṣṭhaṃ praviśya kāryāṇi kuruṣva kṣipram //
S04bsu036_u:2912: Saddhp_7.100 udagracittā bhaṇatheha nirvṛtā nistīrṇa sarvā aṭavī aśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2913: āśvāsanārthāya vadeti vācaṃ kathaṃ na pratyāgata sarvi asyā //
S04bsu036_u:2914: Saddhp_7.101 viśrāntarūpāṃśca viditva sarvān samānayitvā ca punarbravīti /
S04bsu036_u:2915: āgacchatha mahya śṛṇotha bhāṣato ṛddhīmayaṃ nagaramidaṃ vinirmitam //
S04bsu036_u:2916: Saddhp_7.102 yuṣmāka khedaṃ ca mayā vitdivā nivartanaṃ mā ca bhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu036_u:2917: upāyakauśalyamidaṃ mameti janetha vīryaṃ gamanāya dvīpam //
S04bsu036_u:2918: Saddhp_7.103 emeva haṃ bhikṣava deśiko vā praṇāyakaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭinām /
S04bsu036_u:2919: khidyanta paśyāmi tathaiva prāṇinaḥ kleśāṇḍakośaṃ na prabhonti bhettum //
S04bsu036_u:2920: Saddhp_7.104 tato mayā cintitu eṣa artho viśrāmabhūtā imi nirvṛtīkṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2921: sarvasya duḥkhasya nirodha eṣa arhantabhūmau kṛtakṛtya yūyam //
S04bsu036_u:2922: Saddhp_7.105 samaye yadā tu sthita atra sthāne paśyāmi yūyāmarhanta tatra sarvān /
S04bsu036_u:2923: tadā ca sarvāniha saṃnipātya bhūtārthamākhyāmi yathaiṣa dharmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2924: Saddhp_7.106 upāyakauśalya vināyakānāṃ yad yāna deśenti trayo maharṣī /
S04bsu036_u:2925: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ na dvitīyamasti viśrāmaṇārthaṃ tu dviyāna deśitā //
S04bsu036_u:2926: Saddhp_7.107 tato vademi ahamadya bhikṣavo janetha vīryaṃ paramaṃ udāram /
S04bsu036_u:2927: sarvajñajñānena kṛtena yūyaṃ naitāvatā nirvṛti kāci bhoti //
S04bsu036_u:2928: Saddhp_7.108 sarvajñajñānaṃ tu yadā spṛśiṣyatha daśo balā ye ca jināna dharmāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2930: Saddhp_7.109 etādṛśī deśana nāyakānāṃ viśrāmahetoḥ pravadanti nirvṛtim /
S04bsu036_u:2931: viśrānta jñātvāna ca nirvṛtīye sarvajñajñāne upanenti sarvān //
S04bsu036_u:2936_1: saṃdhābhāṣitanirdeśaṃ śrutvā eṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktāṃ
S04bsu036_u:2936_2: kathāṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca bhagavato vṛṣabhatāṃ śrutvā āścaryaprāpto 'bhūdadbhutaprāpto
S04bsu036_u:2937: mahatā ca prītiprāmodyena mahatā ca dharmagauraveṇa utthāyāsanād bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ cittamutpāditavān - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S04bsu036_u:2944: tathāgata evāsmākaṃ jānīte āśayaṃ pūrvayogacaryāṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:2945: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthito 'bhūd bhagavantameva namaskurvan animiṣābhyāṃ ca netrābhyāṃ saṃprekṣamāṇaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2946_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ pūrṇasya maitrāyaṇīputrasya cittāśayamavalokya sarvāvantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:2946_1: bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyamimaṃ śrāvakaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputraṃ
S04bsu036_u:2949: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'klānto dharmadeśanayā,

S04bsu036_u:3553: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3554: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3555: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma /
S04bsu036_u:3558: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca [Vaidya_152] vṛkṣaiścitritam /
S04bsu036_u:3560: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3561: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3562: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham /
S04bsu036_u:3568: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā //
S04bsu036_u:3569: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
S04bsu036_u:3571: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3572: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3573: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam /
S04bsu036_u:3574: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma - gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam /
S04bsu036_u:3575_0: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3575_1: vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3577: evaṃ ca vadadhvam - dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane /
S04bsu036_u:3578: evaṃ te tathāgatāḥ sarve svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayāmāsuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3579: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svānnirmitānaśeṣataḥ samāgatān viditvā,
S04bsu036_u:3584: tāśca sarvāścatasraḥ pariṣadaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo 'ñjalīḥ parigṛhya bhagavato mukhamullokayantyastasthuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3585: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ [Vaidya_153] mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:3586: samuddhāṭya ca dve bhittī pravisārayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:3588: evameva bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭya apāvṛṇoti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3590: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddvā pariśuṣkagātraḥ saṃghaṭitakāyo yathā samādhisamāpannastathā saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu036_u:3591: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune /
S04bsu036_u:3593: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagavan śākyamune yastvamimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parṣanmadhye bhāṣase /
S04bsu036_u:3595_0: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3596_0: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha
S04bsu036_u:3596_1: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ divyamānuṣyakai
S04bsu036_u:3597: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasminneva siṃhāsane 'rdhāsanamadāsīt,
S04bsu036_u:3599: evaṃ ca vadati - ihaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato niṣīdatu /
S04bsu036_u:3600: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasminnardhāsane niṣasāda tenaiva tathāgatena sārdham /
S04bsu036_u:3601: ubhau ca tau tathāgatau tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau vaihāyasamantarīkṣasthau saṃdṛśyete //
S04bsu036_u:3602: atha khalu tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmetadabhavat - dūrasthā vayamābhyāṃ tathāgatābhyām /
S04bsu036_u:3604_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S04bsu036_u:3604_1: tasyāṃ velāyāmṛddhibalena tāścatasraḥ parṣado vaihāyasamuparyantarīkṣe pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:3605_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣada āmantrayate
S04bsu036_u:3605_1: sma - ko bhikṣavo yuṣmākamutsahate tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3610: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:3611: Saddhp_11.1 ayamāgato nirvṛtako maharṣī ratanāmayaṃ stūpa praviśya nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3612: śravaṇārtha dharmasya imasya bhikṣavaḥ ko dharmahetorna janeta vīryam //
S04bsu036_u:3613: Saddhp_11.2 bahukalpakoṭīparinirvṛto 'pi so nāma adyāpi śṛṇoti dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:3614: tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati dharmahetoḥ sudurlabho dharma yamevarūpaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3615: Saddhp_11.3 praṇidhānametasya vināyakasya niṣevitaṃ pūrvabhave yadāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:3617: Saddhp_11.4 ime ca sarve mama ātmabhāvāḥ sahasrakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3618: te dharmakṛtyasya kṛtena āgatāḥ parinirvṛtaṃ ca imu draṣṭu nātham //
S04bsu036_u:3619: Saddhp_11.5 choritva kṣetrāṇi svakasvakāni tatha śrāvakāntara marutaśca sarvān /
S04bsu036_u:3620: saddharmasaṃrakṣaṇahetu sarve kathaṃ ciraṃ tiṣṭhiya dharmanetrī //
S04bsu036_u:3621: Saddhp_11.6 eteṣu buddhāna niṣīdanārthaṃ bahulokadhātūna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3622: saṃkrāmitā me tatha sarvasattvā ṛddhībalena pariśodhitāśca //
S04bsu036_u:3623: Saddhp_11.7 etādṛśī utsukatā iyaṃ me kathaṃ prakāśediya dharmanetrī /
S04bsu036_u:3624: ime ca buddhā sthita aprameyā drumāṇa mūle yatha padmarāśiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3626: śobhanti tiṣṭhanti ca nityakālaṃ hutāśaneneva yathāndhakāram //
S04bsu036_u:3627: gandho manojño daśasū diśāsu pravāyate lokavināyakānām /
S04bsu036_u:3628: Saddhp_11.9 gandho manojño daśasū diśāsu pravāyate lokavināyakānām /
S04bsu036_u:3630: yenā ime mūrcchita sarvasattvā vāte pravāte iha nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:3631: Saddhp_11.10 mayi nirvṛte yo etaṃ dharmaparyāyu dhārayet /
S04bsu036_u:3633: Saddhp_11.11 parinirvṛto hi saṃbuddhaḥ prabhūtaratano muniḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3634: siṃhanādaṃ śruṇe tasya vyavasāyaṃ karoti yaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3635: Saddhp_11.12 ahaṃ dvitīyo bahavo ime ca ye koṭiyo āgata nāyakānām /
S04bsu036_u:3636: vyavasāya śroṣyāmi jinasya putrāt yo utsaheddharmamimaṃ prakāśitum //
S04bsu036_u:3637: Saddhp_11.13 ahaṃ ca tena bhavi pūjitaḥ sadā prabhūtaratnaśca jinaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3638: yo gacchate diśavidiśāsu nityaṃ śravaṇāya dharmaṃ imamevarūpam //
S04bsu036_u:3639: Saddhp_11.14 ime ca ye āgata lokanāthā vicitritā yairiya śobhitā bhūḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3640: teṣāṃ pi pūjā vipula analpakā kṛtā bhavetsūtraprakāśanena //
S04bsu036_u:3641: Saddhp_11.15 ahaṃ ca dṛṣṭo iha āsanasmin bhagavāṃśca yo 'yaṃ sthitu stūpamadhye /
S04bsu036_u:3642: ime ca anye bahulokanāthā ye āgatāḥ kṣetraśatairanekaiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3647: Saddhp_11.18 sumeruṃ yaśca hastena adhyālambitva muṣṭinā /
S04bsu036_u:3649: Saddhp_11.19 yaśca imāṃ trisāhasrīṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena kampayet /
S04bsu036_u:3651: Saddhp_11.20 bhavāgre yaśca tiṣṭhitvā dharmaṃ bhāṣennaro iha /
S04bsu036_u:3654: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ bhāṣedvā tatsuduṣkaram //
S04bsu036_u:3655: Saddhp_11.22 ākāśadhātuṃ yaḥ sarvāmekamuṣṭiṃ tu nikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:3656: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta na tadbhavati duṣkaram //
S04bsu036_u:3657: Saddhp_11.23 yastu īdṛśakaṃ sūtraṃ nirvṛtasmiṃstadā mayi /
S04bsu036_u:3659: Saddhp_11.24 pṛthivīdhātuṃ ca yaḥ sarvaṃ nakhāgre saṃpraveśayet /
S04bsu036_u:3660: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta brahmalokaṃ pi āruhet //
S04bsu036_u:3661: Saddhp_11.25 na duṣkaraṃ hi so kuryānna ca vīryasya tattakam /
S04bsu036_u:3663: Saddhp_11.26 ato 'pi duṣkarataraṃ nirvṛtasya tadā mama /
S04bsu036_u:3664: paścātkāle idaṃ sūtraṃ vadeyā yo muhūrtakam //
S04bsu036_u:3665: Saddhp_11.27 na duṣkaramidaṃ loke kalpadāhasmi yo naraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3667: Saddhp_11.28 ato 'pi duṣkarataraṃ nirvṛtasya tadā mama /
S04bsu036_u:3671: Saddhp_11.30 na hyetaṃ duṣkaraṃ bhoti tasmin kālasmi bhikṣuṇām /
S04bsu036_u:3673: Saddhp_11.31 tasyedaṃ duṣkarataraṃ idaṃ sūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
S04bsu036_u:3675: Saddhp_11.32 koṭīsahasrān bahavaḥ arhattve yo 'pi sthāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:3677: Saddhp_11.33 ato bahutaraṃ karma karoti sa narottamaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3678: nirvṛtasya hi yo mahyaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayate varam //
S04bsu036_u:3679: Saddhp_11.34 lokadhātusahasreṣu bahu me dharma bhāṣitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3681: Saddhp_11.35 idaṃ tu sarvasūtreṣu sūtramagraṃ pravucyate /
S04bsu036_u:3682: dhāreti yo idaṃ sūtraṃ sa dhāre jinavigraham //
S04bsu036_u:3684: ya utsahati vaḥ kaścit paścātkālasmi dhāraṇam //
S04bsu036_u:3685: Saddhp_11.37 mahatpriyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhoti lokanāthāna sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3687: Saddhp_11.38 saṃvarṇitaśca so bhoti lokanāthehi sarvadā /
S04bsu036_u:3689: Saddhp_11.39 dhurāvāhaśca so bhoti lokanāthāna aurasaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3691: Saddhp_11.40 cakṣubhūtaśca so bhoti loke sāmaramānuṣe /
S04bsu036_u:3693: Saddhp_11.41 vandanīyaśca so bhoti sarvasattvāna paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3694: paścime kāli yo bhāṣet sūtramekaṃ muhūrtakam //
S04bsu036_u:3695_0: atha khalu bhagavān kṛtsnaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ sasurāsuraṃ ca lokamāmantraya etadavocat
S04bsu036_u:3696: pūrvaṃ ca ahamanekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi rājābhūvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3700: tena ca samayena ayaṃ loko dīrghāyurabhat /
S04bsu036_u:3701: anekavarṣaśatasahasrajīvitena ca ahaṃ kālena dharmārthaṃ rājyaṃ kāritavān,
S04bsu036_u:3703: so 'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya caturdiśaṃ jyeṣṭhadharmagaveṣaṇāya udyukto 'bhūvam /
S04bsu036_u:3704: evaṃ ghaṇṭayā ghoṣāpayitavān - yo me jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamanupradāsyati,
S04bsu036_u:3708: sa māmetadavocat - asti mahārāja saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma sutraṃ jyeṣṭhadharmanirdeśakam /
S04bsu036_u:3711: so 'haṃ śrutvā tasyarṣervacanaṃ hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena sa ṛṣistenopeyivān /
S04bsu036_u:3712: upetyāvocat - yatte dāsena karma karaṇīyaṃ tatkaromi /
S04bsu036_u:3715: divasaṃ caivaṃvidhaṃ karma kṛtvā rātrau śayānasya mañcake pādān dhārayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:3716: na ca me kāyaklamo na cetasi klamo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3717: evaṃ ca me kurvataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣāsahasraṃ gatam //
S04bsu036_u:3719: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ paridyotayannimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:3720: Saddhp_11.42 kalpānatītān samanusmarāmi yadāhamāsaṃ dhārmiko dharmarājā /
S04bsu036_u:3721: rājyaṃ came dharmahetoḥ kṛtaṃ tanna ca kāmahetorjyeṣṭhadharmahetoḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3722: Saddhp_11.43 caturdiśaṃ me kṛta ghoṣaṇo 'yaṃ dharmaṃ vadedyastasya dāsyaṃ vrajeyam /
S04bsu036_u:3723: āsīdṛṣistena kālena dhīmān sūtrasya saddharmanāmnaḥ pravaktāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3724: Saddhp_11.44 sa māmavocadyadi te dharmakāṅkṣā upehi dāsyaṃ dharmamataḥ pravakṣye /
S04bsu036_u:3725: tuṣṭaścāhaṃ vacanaṃ taṃ niśāmya karmākaroddāsayogyaṃ tadā yam //
S04bsu036_u:3727: praṇidhistadā me bhavi sattvahetornātmānamuddiśya na kāmahetoḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3728: Saddhp_11.46 sa rāja āsīttadā abdhavīryo ananyakarmāṇi daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu036_u:3729: paripūrṇa kalpāna sahasrakhinno yāvatsūtraṃ labdhavān dharmanāmam //
S04bsu036_u:3730: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt?
S04bsu036_u:3733: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūvam /
S04bsu036_u:3734: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo 'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenarṣirabhūt?
S04bsu036_u:3736: ayameva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto bhikṣurṛṣirabhut /
S04bsu036_u:3738: devadattameva cāgamya mayā ṣaṭū pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3740_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūni aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā maharddhibalatā
S04bsu036_u:3743_0: prativedayāmi - eṣa devadatto bhikṣuranāgate 'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyairdevarājo
S04bsu036_u:3743_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān
S04bsu036_u:3750: devarājasya khalu punarbhikṣavastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:3752: ekaghanaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ bhaviṣyati saptaratnastūpaṃ praviṣṭam /
S04bsu036_u:3755: sarve ca tatra devamanuṣyāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhirgāthābhiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3757: ye ca taṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kariṣyanti praṇāmaṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:3758: teṣāṃ kecidagraphalamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti kecit pratyekabodhimanuprāpsyante acintyācāścāprameyā devamanuṣyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu036_u:3760: atha khalu bhagavān punareva bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - yaḥ kaścit bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'dhvani kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraparivartaṃ śroṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:3761: śrutvā ca na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:3763: tena tisṛṇāṃ durgatīnāṃ dvāraṃ pithitaṃ bhaviṣyati ḥ narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṣu na patiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:3767: tasminnaupapāduke saptaratnamaye padme upapatsyate tathāgatasya saṃmukham //
S04bsu036_u:3768: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmadhastāddiśaḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādāgataḥ prajñākūṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3769: sa taṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - gacchāmo bhagavan svakaṃ buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu036_u:3770_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - muhūrtaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3770_1: tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvanmadīyena bodhisattvena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ
