S04bsu036_u:4427: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4428: Saddhp_14.33 prayatā bhavadhvaṃ kulaputra sarva imāṃ pramuñcāmi girāmananyathām /
S04bsu036_u:4429: mā khū viṣādaṃ kurutheha paṇḍitā acintiyaṃ jñānu tathāgatānām //
S04bsu036_u:4430: Saddhp_14.34 dhṛtimanta bhūtvā smṛtimanta sarve samāhitāḥ sarviḥ sthitā bhavadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:4431: apūrvadharmo śruṇitavyu adya āścaryabhūto hi tathāgatānām //
S04bsu036_u:4432: Saddhp_14.35 vicikitsa mā jātu kurudhva sarve ahaṃ hi yuṣmān parisaṃsthapemi /
S04bsu036_u:4433: ananyathāvādirahaṃ vināyako jñānaṃ ca me yasya na kāci saṃkhyā //
S04bsu036_u:4434: gambhīra dharmāḥ sugatena buddhā atarkiyā yeṣa premāṇu nāsti /
S04bsu036_u:4435: Saddhp_14.36 gambhīra dharmāḥ sugatena buddhā atarkiyā yeṣa premāṇu nāsti /
S04bsu036_u:4437: tānadya haṃ dharma prakāśayiṣye śṛṇotha me yādṛśakā yathā ca te //
S04bsu036_u:4438: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ maitrayaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - ārocayāmi te ajita,
S04bsu036_u:4440: ya ime ajita bodhisattvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā agaṇanīyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4443: mayaite ajita sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4445: mayā caite kulaputrā asmin bodhisattvadharme paripācitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā niveśitāḥ parisaṃsthāpitā avatāritāḥ paribodhitāḥ pariśodhitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4446: ete ca ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhastādākāśadhātuparigrahe prativasanti /
S04bsu036_u:4447: svādhyāyoddeśacintāyoniśomanasikārapravṛttā ete kulaputrā asaṃgaṇikārāmā asaṃsargābhiratā anikṣiptadhurā ārabdhavīryāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4451: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4452: Saddhp_14.37 ye bodhisattvā ime aprameyā acintiyā yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
S04bsu036_u:4454: Saddhp_14.38 paripācitāḥ sarvi mayaiti bodhaye mamaiva kṣetrasmi vasanti caite /
S04bsu036_u:4455: paripācitāḥ sarvi mayaiva ete mamaiva putrāścimi bodhisattvāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4456: Saddhp_14.39 sarve ti āraṇyadhutābhiyuktāḥ saṃsargabhūmiṃ sada varjayanti /
S04bsu036_u:4457: asaṅgacārī ca mamaiti putrā mamottamāṃ caryanuśikṣamāṇāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4458: Saddhp_14.40 vasanti ākāśaparigrahe 'smin kṣetrasya heṣṭhā paricāri vīrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4460: Saddhp_14.41 ārabdhavīryāḥ smṛtimanta sarve prajñābalasmin sthita aprameye /
S04bsu036_u:4461: viśāradā dharmu kathenti caite prabhāsvarā putra mamaiti sarve //
S04bsu036_u:4462: Saddhp_14.42 mayā ca prāpya imamagrabodhiṃ nagare gayāyāṃ drumamūli tatra /
S04bsu036_u:4463: anuttaraṃ vartiya dharmacakraṃ paripācitāḥ sarvi ihāgrabodhau //
S04bsu036_u:4464: Saddhp_14.43 anāsravā bhūta iyaṃ mi vācā śruṇitva sarve mama śraddadhadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:4465: evaṃ ciraṃ prāpta mayāgrabodhi paripācitāścaiti mayaiva sarve //
S04bsu036_u:4466: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:4467: adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni - kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ samādāpitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4469_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena
S04bsu036_u:4471: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam,
S04bsu036_u:4473: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ paripācitaśca?
S04bsu036_u:4474: asya bhagavan bodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvarāśergaṇyamānasya kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapyanto nopalabhyate /
S04bsu036_u:4477: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:4479: evaṃ ca vadet - ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti /
S04bsu036_u:4480: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ - eṣo 'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti /
S04bsu036_u:4481: tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam /
S04bsu036_u:4489: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati - mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4491: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti /
S04bsu036_u:4492: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ - ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti /
S04bsu036_u:4494: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante /
S04bsu036_u:4495: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4496: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4499: anāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti //
S04bsu036_u:4500: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4501: Saddhp_14.44 yadāsi jāto kapilāhvayasmin śākyādhivāse abhiniṣkramitvā /
S04bsu036_u:4502: prāpto 'si bodhiṃ nagare gayāhvaye kālo 'yamalpo 'tra tu lokanātha //
S04bsu036_u:4503: Saddhp_14.45 ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū ye kalpakoṭīcaritā mahāgaṇī /
S04bsu036_u:4504: ṛddhībale ca sthita aprakampitāḥ suśikṣitāḥ prajñabale gatiṃgatāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4505: Saddhp_14.46 anūpaliptāḥ padumaṃ va vāriṇā bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4506: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravāḥ smṛtimanta lokādhipatisya putrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4507: Saddhp_14.47 kathaṃ imaṃ adbhutamīdṛśaṃ te taṃ śraddadhiṣyantimi bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4508: vicikitsanirghātanahetu bhāṣa taṃ tvaṃ caiva deśehi yathaiva arthaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4509: Saddhp_14.48 yathā hi puruṣo iha kaścideva daharo bhaveyā śiśu kṛṣṇakeśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4510: jātyā ca so viṃśatiruttare vā darśeti putrān śatavarṣajātān //
S04bsu036_u:4511: Saddhp_14.49 valīhi palitehi ca te upetā eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4512: duḥśraddadhaṃ tadbhavi lokanātha daharasya putrā imi evarūpāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4513: Saddhp_14.50 emeva bhagavāṃśca navo vayasthaḥ ime ca vijñā bahubodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4515: Saddhp_14.51 dhṛtimanta prajñāya vicakṣaṇāśca prāsādikā darśaniyāśca sarve /
S04bsu036_u:4517: Saddhp_14.52 asaṅgacārī pavaneva santi ākāśadhātau satataṃ aniśritāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4518: jānenti vīryaṃ sugatasya putrāḥ paryeṣamāṇā ima buddhabhūmim //
S04bsu036_u:4519: Saddhp_14.53 kathaṃ nu śraddheyamidaṃ bhaveyā parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin /
S04bsu036_u:4520: vicikitsa asmāka na kācidasti śṛṇomathā saṃmukha lokanāthā //
S04bsu036_u:4521: Saddhp_14.54 vicikitsa kṛtvāna imasmi sthāne gaccheyu mā durgati bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4522: tvaṃ vyākuruṣvā bhagavan yathāvat katha bodhisattvāḥ paripācitā ime //
S04bsu036_u:4527: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4529: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4531: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4533: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:4536: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:4539: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:4542: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam,
S04bsu036_u:4543_0: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte - sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
S04bsu036_u:4545: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya /
S04bsu036_u:4546: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4548: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:4549: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāṃllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:4550: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:4551: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā?
S04bsu036_u:4552: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat - asaṃkhyeyāste bhagavaṃllokadhātavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4554: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4555: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate /
S04bsu036_u:4558: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4560: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
S04bsu036_u:4562: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:4564: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu036_u:4566: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4570: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:4572: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4573: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati - daharo 'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4576: tathāgata evaṃ cirābhisaṃbuddha evaṃ vyāharati - acirābhisaṃbuddho 'hamasmīti,
S04bsu036_u:4579: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4580: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
S04bsu036_u:4581: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
S04bsu036_u:4586: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
S04bsu036_u:4587: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā /
S04bsu036_u:4588: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4592: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:4596: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā /
S04bsu036_u:4598: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt /
S04bsu036_u:4599: idānīṃ [Vaidya_191] khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:4601_0: sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi - mā haiva me 'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato
S04bsu036_u:4601_2: andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4602: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ - āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti /
S04bsu036_u:4605: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:4607: tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4609: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi - durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti /
S04bsu036_u:4610: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:4612: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya /
S04bsu036_u:4613: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4614: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu036_u:4617: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:4618: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4620: te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4621: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4622: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4623: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet /
S04bsu036_u:4624: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4627: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4628: evaṃ cainaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭyāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4631: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
S04bsu036_u:4632: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
S04bsu036_u:4633: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:4634: evaṃ cainān vadet - pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam /
S04bsu036_u:4635: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
S04bsu036_u:4637: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4638: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4639: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4640: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti /
S04bsu036_u:4644: tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate,
S04bsu036_u:4646: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet - ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4650: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet - jīrṇo 'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4658: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4659: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet,
S04bsu036_u:4661: atīva parideveyuḥ - yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako 'nukampakaḥ so 'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4663: te khalvanāthabhūtamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'śaraṇamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'bhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4664: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:4665: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4668: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet /
S04bsu036_u:4669: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet?
S04bsu036_u:4673: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham /
S04bsu036_u:4674: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati //
S04bsu036_u:4675: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata -

S04bsu036_u:4678: Saddhp_15.2 samādapemī bahubodhisattvān bauddhasmi jñānasmi sthapemi caiva /

S04bsu036_u:4688: Saddhp_15.7 evaṃ ca haṃ teṣa vadāmi paścāt ihaiva nāhaṃ tada āsi nirvṛtaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4690: Saddhp_15.8 anyehi sattvehi puraskṛto 'haṃ teṣāṃ prakāśemi mamāgrabodhim /

S04bsu036_u:4692: Saddhp_15.9 paśyāmyahaṃ sattva vihanyamānān na cāhu darśemi tadātmabhāvam /
S04bsu036_u:4693: spṛhentu tāvanmama darśanasya tṛṣitāna saddharmu prakāśayiṣye //
S04bsu036_u:4695: Saddhp_15.10 sadādhiṣṭhānaṃ mama etadīdṛśaṃ acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4698: Saddhp_15.11 yadāpi sattvā ima lokadhātuṃ paśyanti kalpenti ca dahyamānam /
S04bsu036_u:4699: tadāpi cedaṃ mama buddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇa bhotī marumānuṣāṇām //
S04bsu036_u:4700: Saddhp_15.12 krīḍā ratī teṣa vicitra bhoti udyānaprāsādavimānakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4702: Saddhp_15.13 upariṃ ca devābhihananti tūryān mandāravarṣaṃ ca visarjayanti /

S04bsu036_u:4712: Saddhp_15.18 etādṛśaṃ jñānabalaṃ mayedaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ yasya na kaścidantaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4716: Saddhp_15.20 yathā hi so vaidya upāyaśikṣito viparītasaṃjñīna sutāna hetoḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4718: Saddhp_15.21 yameva haṃ lokapitā svayaṃbhūḥ cikitsakaḥ sarvaprajāna nāthaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4720: Saddhp_15.22 kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mahyamabhīkṣṇadarśanād viśraddha bhontī abudhā ajānakāḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4722: Saddhp_15.23 cariṃ cariṃ jāniya nityakālaṃ vadāmi sattvāna tathā tathāham /

S04bsu036_u:4739: anye caikacḥturdvīpikḥ lokadhḥtuparamḥṇurajaḥsamḥ bodhisattvḥ mahḥsattvḥ imaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ śrutvḥ ekajḥtipratibaddhḥ abhūvannanuttarḥyḥṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:4740: aṣṭatrisḥhasramahḥsḥhasralokadhḥtuparamḥṇurajaḥsamaiśca bodhisattvairmahḥsattvairimaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ śrutvḥ anuttarḥyḥṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittḥnyutpḥditḥni
S04bsu036_u:4741: atha samanantaranirdiṣṭe bhagavataiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmābhisamaye pratiṣṭhāne,

S04bsu036_u:4759_1: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvadbrahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe dhārayāmāsuḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4770: Saddhp_16.5 kecittu catvāri atikramitvā kecitribhiścaiva dvibhiśca anye /

S04bsu036_u:4829: Saddhp_16.28 tena dhyānena so vīraḥ prārthayed bodhimuttamām /
S04bsu036_u:4831: Saddhp_16.29 yacca puṇyaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ niṣevitvā imāṃ kriyām /
S04bsu036_u:4833: Saddhp_16.30 āyuṃ ca mama yo śrutvā strī vāpi puruṣo 'pi vā /
S04bsu036_u:4835: Saddhp_16.31 vicikitsāṃ ca varjitvā iñjitā manyitāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:4837: Saddhp_16.32 bodhisattvāśca ye bhonti caritāḥ kalpakoṭiyaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4845: Saddhp_16.36 adhyāśayena saṃpannāḥ śrutādhārāśca ye narāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4846: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ vijānanti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu036_u:4847: punaraparamajita ya imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avataredadhimucyeta avagāheta avabudhyeta,
S04bsu036_u:4849: kaḥ punarvādo ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayeta vācayeda dhārayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā pustakagataṃ vā satkuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:4852: yadā ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāya śrutvā adhyāśayenādhimucyate,
S04bsu036_u:4853_0: tadā tasyedamadhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam - yaduta gṛdhrakūṭaparvatagataṃ māṃ dharmaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4854: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām /
S04bsu036_u:4855: kūṭāgāraparibhogeṣu ca atra bodhisattvān nivasato drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:4856: idamajita adhyāśayenādhimuktasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā adhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
S04bsu036_u:4857: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi,
S04bsu036_u:4858: ye tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣepsyanti uttari cābhyanumodayiṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4860: tatastathāgataṃ soṃ 'sena pariharati ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati /
S04bsu036_u:4861: na me tenājita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā stūpāḥ kartavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4865: kṛtā me tena ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śarīreṣu śarīrapūjā,
S04bsu036_u:4867: yāvad brahmalokamuccaistvena anupūrvapariṇāhena sacchatraparigrahāḥ savaijayantīkā ghaṇṭāsamudgānuratāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4868_0: teṣāṃ ca śarīrastūpānāṃ vividhāḥ satkārāḥ kṛtā nānāvidhairdivyairmānuṣyakaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhirvividhamadhuramanojñapaṭupaṭahadundubhimahādundubhibhirvādyatālaninādarnirghoṣaśabdairnānāvidhaiśca
S04bsu036_u:4869: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā [Vaidya_202] prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4872: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4873: te ca mama saṃmukhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4875: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā lekhayedvā,
S04bsu036_u:4876: tadanenāhamajitaparyāyeṇa evaṃ vadāmi - na me tena parinirvṛtasya dhātustūpāḥ kārayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4878: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena
S04bsu036_u:4880: bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam /
S04bsu036_u:4881: tadyathāpi nāma ajita ākāśa dhāturaparyantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu dikṣu vidikṣu,
S04bsu036_u:4882_0: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyābhisaṃskārān prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyān
S04bsu036_u:4882_1: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā /
S04bsu036_u:4896: yasya kasyacidajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpā guṇā bhaveyurye mayā parikīrtitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4897: so 'jita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ veditavyaḥ - bodhimaṇḍasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu036_u:4898: yatra ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tiṣṭhedvā niṣīdedvā caṃkramedvā,
S04bsu036_u:4900: tathāgatastūpo 'yamiti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sadevakena lokeneti //
S04bsu036_u:4901: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4902: Saddhp_16.37 puṇyaskandho aparyanto varṇito me punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4904: Saddhp_16.38 pūjāśca me kṛtāstena dhātustūpāśca kāritāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4910: Saddhp_16.41 pūjā ca vipulā teṣāṃ puṣpagandhavilepanaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4911: kṛtā vādyaiśca vastraiśca dundubhībhiḥ punaḥ puna //
S04bsu036_u:4912: Saddhp_16.42 madhurā vādyabhāṇḍā ca vāditā teṣu dhātuṣu /
S04bsu036_u:4914: Saddhp_16.43 ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāli ca deśayet /
S04bsu036_u:4915: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā pūjanantikā //
S04bsu036_u:4922: Saddhp_16.47 saṃghasya vividhā pūjā kṛtā me tena saṃmukham /
S04bsu036_u:4924: Saddhp_16.48 adhimuktisāro yo syādato bahutaraṃ hi saḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4925: puṇyaṃ labheta yo etatsūtraṃ vācellikheta vā //
S04bsu036_u:4926: Saddhp_16.49 likhāpayennaraḥ kaścit suniruktaṃ ca pustake /
S04bsu036_u:4928: Saddhp_16.50 dīpaṃ ca dadyādyo nityaṃ gandhatailasya pūritam /
S04bsu036_u:4930: Saddhp_16.51 kuryādetādṛśīṃ pūjāṃ pustakeṣu ca yo naraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4931: bahu prasavate puṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya no bhavet //
S04bsu036_u:4934: Saddhp_16.53 kaḥ punarvādo yaśca syāt kṣānto dāntaḥ samāhitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4937: bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇato nityaṃ nādhimānī na cālasaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4938: Saddhp_16.55 prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati /
S04bsu036_u:4939: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu //
S04bsu036_u:4940: Saddhp_16.56 ya īdṛśo bhavetkaścid yaḥ sūtraṃ dhārayedidam /
S04bsu036_u:4944: Saddhp_16.58 divyaiśca puṣpaistatha okireta divyaiśca vastrairabhicchādayeta /
S04bsu036_u:4945: mūrdhena vanditva ca tasya pādau tathāgato 'yaṃ janayeta saṃjñām //
S04bsu036_u:4946: Saddhp_16.59 dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ cintayi tasmi kāle gamiṣyate eṣa drumasya mūlam /
S04bsu036_u:4947: budhyiṣyate bodhimanuttarāṃ śivāṃ hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:4948: Saddhp_16.60 yasmiṃśca so caṃkrami tādṛśo viduḥ tiṣṭheta vā yatra niṣīdayedvā /
S04bsu036_u:4949: śayyāṃ ca kalpeya kahiṃci dhīro bhāṣantu gāthāṃ pi tu ekasūtrāt //
S04bsu036_u:4951: uddiśya buddhaṃ bhagavanta nāyakaṃ pūjāṃ ca citrāṃ tahi kārayettathā //
S04bsu036_u:4952: Saddhp_16.62 mayā sa bhuktaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo mayā svayaṃ caṃkramitaṃ ca tatraṃ /
S04bsu036_u:4953: tatropaviṣṭo ahameva ca syāṃ yatra sthitaḥ so bhavi buddhaputraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4954: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4958: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā anumodet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S04bsu036_u:4959: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavediti?
S04bsu036_u:4960: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4963_0: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścidajita
S04bsu036_u:4963_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāya deśyamānaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4963_2: saṃprakāśyamānaṃ śṛṇuyād bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā vijñapuruṣo vā kumārako vā,
S04bsu036_u:4967_0: sa ca vihāragato vā gṛhagato vā araṇyagato vā vīthīgato vā grāmagato vā janapadagato
S04bsu036_u:4967_1: vā tān hetūṃstāni kāraṇāni taṃ dharmaṃ yathāśrutaṃ yathodgṛhītaṃ yathābalamaparasya
S04bsu036_u:4968: saṃmoditasya vā anyasya vā saṃstutasya kasyacit,
S04bsu036_u:4975: atha khalvajita yo 'sau pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣo bhavet paraṃparāśravānumodakaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4976: tasyāpi tāvadahamajita kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhinirdekṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:4977: taṃ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu036_u:4979: tadyathāpi nāma ajita caturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu ye sattvāḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānāḥ ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4980_0: aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā
S04bsu036_u:4980_1: asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñino vā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā
S04bsu036_u:4980_2: vā yāvadeva sattvāḥ sattvadhātau saṃgrahasamavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:4981: atha kaścideva puruṣaḥ samutpadyeta puṇyakāmo hitakāmastasya sattvakāyasya sarvakāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāniṣṭān kāntān priyān manāpān dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:4982: ekaikasya sattvasya jambudvīpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ dadyāt kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāya,
S04bsu036_u:4984: anena paryāyeṇa ajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ paripūrṇānyaśītiṃ varṣāṇi dānaṃ dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:4985: atha khalvajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirevaṃ cintayet - ime khalu sattvāḥ sarve mayā krīḍāpitā ramāpitāḥ sukhaṃ jivāpitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4986: ime ca te bhavantaḥ sattvā balinaḥ palitaśiraso jīrṇavṛddhā mahallakā [Vaidya_206] aśītivarṣikā jātyā /
S04bsu036_u:4989: atha khalvajita sa puruṣastān sarvasattvān samādāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:4991: tasya te sattvāstaṃ ca dharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4992: śrutvā ca ekakṣaṇena ekamuhūrtena ekalavena sarve srotaāpannāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4995: tatkiṃ manyase ajita api nu sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatistatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam?
S04bsu036_u:4996: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan,
S04bsu036_u:4998: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirbahu puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S04bsu036_u:5002: evamukte bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ārocayāmi te ajita,
S04bsu036_u:5004: yaśca sa dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ puruṣaścaturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ paripūrya arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S04bsu036_u:5005: yaśca pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣaḥ paraṃparāśravānugataḥ śravaṇena ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodeta /
S04bsu036_u:5010: tataḥ puruṣaparaṃparāta ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodet /
S04bsu036_u:5011_0: asya anumodanāsahagatasya ajita puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārasya anumodanāsahagatasya
S04bsu036_u:5012: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti /
S04bsu036_u:5013: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniḥadamapi na kḥamate /
S04bsu036_u:5014: evamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamajita so 'pi tāvat pañcāśattamaḥ paraṃparāśravaṇe puruḥa ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi ekapadamapi anumodya ca puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:5015: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita yo 'yaṃ mama saṃmukhamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu036_u:5018: yaḥ khalu punarajita asya dharmaparyāyasya śravāṇārthaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svagṛhānniṣkramya vihāraṃ gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:5019: sa ca gattvā tasminnimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtakamapi śṛṇuyāt sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā /
S04bsu036_u:5020: sa sattvastanmātreṇa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa kṛtenopacitena jātivinivṛtto dvitīye samucchraye dvitīye ātmabhāvapratilambhe gorathānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5021: aśvarathānāṃ hastirathānāṃ śibikānāṃ goyanānāmṛṣabhayānānāṃ divyānāṃ ca vimānānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5022: sacet punastatra dharmaśravaṇe muhūrtamātramapi niṣadya idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu036_u:5025: tena sa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa lābhī bhaviṣyati śakrāsanānāṃ brahmāsanānāṃ cakravartisaṃhāsanānām /
S04bsu036_u:5026: sacet punarajita kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aparaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:5028: sa ca puruṣastasya tāṃ protsāhanāmāgamya yadi muhūrtamātramapi śṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu036_u:5029: sa sattvastena protsāhena kuśalamūlenābhisaṃskṛtena dhāraṇīpratilabdhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu036_u:5032: na tasya jātiśatasahasrairapi pūti mukhaṃ bhavati na durgandhi /
S04bsu036_u:5038: na duḥsaṃsthitadanto na khaṇḍadanto na patitadanto na vakradanto na lamboṣṭho bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:5039: nābhyantaroṣṭho na prasāritoṣṭho na khaṇḍoṣṭho na vaṅkoṣṭho na kṛṣṇoṣṭho na bībhatsoṣṭho bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:5046: api tu khalvajita sūkṣmasujātajihvādantoṣṭho bhavati āyatanāsaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5050: kṣipraṃ ca buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu036_u:5051: paśya ajita ekasattvamapi nāma utsāhayitvā iyat puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:5055: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5056: Saddhp_17.2 pañcāśimo yaśca paraṃparāyāṃ sūtrasyimasyo śṛṇutekagāthām /
S04bsu036_u:5057: anumodayitvā ca prasannacittaḥ śṛṇuṣva puṇyaṃ bhavi yattakaṃ tat //
S04bsu036_u:5058: Saddhp_17.3 sa caiva puruṣo bhavi dānadātā sattvān koṭīnayuteṣu nityam /
S04bsu036_u:5059: ye pūrvamaupamyakṛtā mayā vai tān sarvi tarpeya aśīti varṣān //
S04bsu036_u:5060: Saddhp_17.4 so dṛṣṭva teṣāṃ ca jarāmupasthitāṃ valī ca khaṇḍaṃ ca śiraśca pāṇḍaram /
S04bsu036_u:5061: hāhādhimucyanti hi sarvasattvā yannūna dharmeṇa hu ovadeyam //
S04bsu036_u:5062: Saddhp_17.5 so teṣa dharmaṃ vadatīha paścānnirvāṇabhūmiṃ ca prakāśayeta /
S04bsu036_u:5063: sarve bhavāḥ phenamarīcikalpā nirvidyathā sarvabhaveṣu kṣipram //
S04bsu036_u:5064: Saddhp_17.6 te sarvasattvāśca śruṇitva dharmaṃ tasyaiva dātuḥ puruṣasya antikāt /
S04bsu036_u:5066: Saddhp_17.7 puṇyaṃ tato bahutaru tasya hi syat paraṃparātaḥ śruṇi ekagāthām /
S04bsu036_u:5067: anumodi vā yattaku tasya puṇyaṃ kala puṇyaskandhaḥ purimo na bhoti //
S04bsu036_u:5068: Saddhp_17.8 evaṃ bahu tasya bhaveta puṇyaṃ anantakaṃ yasya pramāṇu nāsti /
S04bsu036_u:5069: gāthāṃ pi śrutvaika paraṃparāya kiṃ vā punaḥ saṃmukha yo śruṇeyā //

S04bsu036_u:5074: Saddhp_17.11 jihvāpi tasya na kadāci duḥkhati na tasya dantā patitā bhavanti /

S04bsu036_u:5086: Saddhp_17.16 vibhūṣitāṃ so śibikāṃ labheta narairanekairiha vāhyamānām /
S04bsu036_u:5087: gatvāpi dharmaṃ śravaṇāya tasya phalaṃ śubhaṃ bhoti ca evarūpam //
S04bsu036_u:5088: Saddhp_17.17 niṣadya cāsau pariṣāya tatra śuklena karmeṇa kṛtena tena /
S04bsu036_u:5089: śakrāsanānāṃ bhavate sa lābhī brahmāsanānāṃ ca nṛpāsanānām //

S04bsu036_u:5119_2: ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau vividhāḥ śabdā niścaranti yāvadavīcirmahānirayo
S04bsu036_u:5120_0: tadyathā - hastiśabdā vā aśvaśabdā vā uṣṭraśabdā vā gośabdā vā ajaśabdā vā janapadaśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_1: vā rathaśabdā vā ruditaśabdā vā śokaśabdā vā bhairavaśabdā vā śaṅkhaśabdā vā ghaṇṭāśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_2: vā paṭahaśabdā vā bherīśabdā vā krīḍāśabdā vā gītaśabdā vā nṛtyaśabdā vā tūryaśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_3: vā vādyaśabdā vā strīśabdā vā puruṣaśabdā vā dārakaśabdā vā [Vaidya_211] dārikāśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_4: vā dharmaśabdā vā adharmaśabdā vā sukhaśabdā vā duḥkhaśabdā vā bālaśabdā vā āryaśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_5: vā manojñaśabdā vā amanojñaśabdā vā devaśabdā vā nāgaśabdā vā yakṣaśabdā vā rākṣasaśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_6: vā gandharvaśabdā vā asuraśabdā vā garuḍaśabdā vā kinnaraśabdā vā mahoragaśabdā vā
S04bsu036_u:5120_7: manuṣyaśabdā vā amanuṣyaśabdā vā agniśabdā vā vāyuśabdā vā udakaśabdā vā grāmaśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5120_8: vā nagaraśabdā vā bhikṣuśabdā vā śrāvakaśabdā vā pratyekabuddhaśabdā vā bodhisattvaśabdā
S04bsu036_u:5121: yāvantaḥ kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sāntarbahiḥ śabdā niścaranti,
S04bsu036_u:5122: tān śabdāṃstena prākṛtena pariśuddhena śrotrendriyeṇa śṛṇoti /
S04bsu036_u:5125: vibhāvayati vibhajati tena ca prākṛtena śrotrendriyeṇa /
S04bsu036_u:5126: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rutāni śṛṇvatastasya taiḥ sarvaśabdaiḥ śrotrendriyaṃ nābhibhūyate /
S04bsu036_u:5127: evaṃrūpaḥ satatasamitābhiyukta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyapratilambho bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:5131: Saddhp_18.7 śrotrendriyaṃ tasya viśuddhu bhoti anāvilaṃ prākṛtakaṃ ca tāvat /
S04bsu036_u:5132: vividhān hi yeneha śṛṇoti śabdāniha lokadhātau hi aśeṣato 'yam //
S04bsu036_u:5133: Saddhp_18.8 hastīna aśvāna śṛṇoti śabdān rathāna goṇāna ajaiḍakānām /
S04bsu036_u:5135: Saddhp_18.9 gītaṃ manojñaṃ madhuraṃ śṛṇoti na cāpi so sajjati tatra dhīraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5136: manuṣyakoṭīna śṛṇoti śabdān bhāṣanti yaṃ yaṃ ca yahiṃ yahiṃ te //
S04bsu036_u:5137: Saddhp_18.10 devāna co nitya śṛṇoti śabdān gītasvaraṃ ca madhuraṃ manojñam /
S04bsu036_u:5138: puruṣāṇa istrīṇa rutāni cāpi tatha dārakāṇāmatha dārikāṇām //
S04bsu036_u:5139: ye parvateṣveva guhānivāsī kalaviṅkakā kokila barhiṇaśca /
S04bsu036_u:5140: Saddhp_18.11 ye parvateṣveva guhānivāsī kalaviṅkakā kokila barhiṇaśca /
S04bsu036_u:5142: pakṣīṇa ye jīvakajīvakā hi teṣāṃ ca valgū śṛṇute hi śabdān //
S04bsu036_u:5143: Saddhp_18.12 narakeṣu ye vedana vedayanti sudāruṇāṃścāpi karonti śabdān /
S04bsu036_u:5144: āhāraduḥkhairavapīḍitānāṃ yān preta kurvanti tathaiva śabdān //
S04bsu036_u:5145: Saddhp_18.13 asurāśca ye sāgaramadhyavāsino muñcanti ghoṣāṃstatha cānyamanyān /
S04bsu036_u:5146: sarvānihastho sa hi dharmabhāṇakaḥ śṛṇoti śabdānna ca ostarīyati //
S04bsu036_u:5147: Saddhp_18.14 tiryāṇa yonīṣu rutāni yāni anyonyasaṃbhāṣaṇatāṃ karonti /
S04bsu036_u:5148: iha sthitastānapi so śṛṇoti vividhāni śabdāni bahūvidhāni //
S04bsu036_u:5149: Saddhp_18.15 ye brahmaloke nivasanti devā akaniṣṭha ābhāsvara ye ca devāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5150: ye cānyamanyasya karonti ghoṣān śṛṇoti tatsarvamaśeṣato 'sau //
S04bsu036_u:5151: Saddhp_18.16 svādhyāya kurvantiha ye ca bhikṣavaḥ sugatāniha śāsani pravrajitvā /
S04bsu036_u:5152: parṣāsu ye deśayate ca dharmaṃ teṣāṃ pi śabdaṃ śṛṇute sa nityam //
S04bsu036_u:5153: Saddhp_18.17 ye bodhisattvāściha lokadhātau svādhyāya kurvanti paraspareṇa /
S04bsu036_u:5154: saṃgīti dharmeṣu ca ye karonti śṛṇoti śabdān vividhāṃśca teṣām //
S04bsu036_u:5155: Saddhp_18.18 bhagavān pi buddho naradamyasārathiḥ parṣāsu dharmaṃ bruvate yamagram /
S04bsu036_u:5156: taṃ cāpi so śṛṇvanti ekakāle yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet //
S04bsu036_u:5157: Saddhp_18.19 sarve trisāhasri imasmi kṣetre ye sattva kurvanti bahūṃ pi śabdān /
S04bsu036_u:5159: Saddhp_18.20 sarveṣa sattvāna śṛṇoti śabdān naṃ cāpi kṣetraṃ uparudhyate 'sya /
S04bsu036_u:5160: paṭvindriyo jānati sthānasthānaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ prākṛtakaṃ hi tāvat //
S04bsu036_u:5161: Saddhp_18.21 na ca tāva divyasmi karoti yatnaṃ prakṛtya saṃtiṣṭhati śrotrametat /
S04bsu036_u:5162: sūtraṃ hi yo dhārayate viśārado guṇā sya etādṛśakā bhavanti //
S04bsu036_u:5163_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5163_1: dhārayataḥ prakāśayataḥ svādhyāyato likhato 'ṣṭābhirguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5164: sa tena pariśuddhena ghrāṇendriyeṇa ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sāntarbahirvividhagandhāḥ saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:5165: tadyathā - pūtigandhā vā manojñagandhā vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ sumanasāṃ gandhāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5182: sa ihasthita eva devānāmapi gandhān ghrāyati,
S04bsu036_u:5183: tadyathā - pārijātakasya kovidārasya māndāravamahāmāndāravamañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakānāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati /
S04bsu036_u:5185: divyānāṃ ca nānāvidhānāṃ puṣpavikṛtiśatasahasrāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati,
S04bsu036_u:5189_0: taṃ ca jānīte yadi vā vaijayante prāsāde krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantaṃ yadi vā
S04bsu036_u:5189_1: sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ yadi vā udyānabhūmau
S04bsu036_u:5195: anena paryāyeṇa yāvad bhavāgropapannānāmapi sattvānāmātmabhāvagandhān ghrāyati /
S04bsu036_u:5200: yasmiṃśca sthāne te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā viharanti,

S04bsu036_u:5207: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5208: Saddhp_18.22 ghrāṇendriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti vividhāṃśca gandhān bahu ghrāyate 'sau /
S04bsu036_u:5209: ye lokadhātau hi imasmi sarve sugandha durgandha bhavanti kecit //
S04bsu036_u:5210: Saddhp_18.23 jātīya gandho atha mallikāyā tamālapatrasya ca candanasya /
S04bsu036_u:5211: tagarasya gandho agarusya cāpi vividhāna puṣpāṇa phalāna cāpi //
S04bsu036_u:5212: Saddhp_18.24 sattvāna gandhān pi tathaiva jānati narāṇa nārīṇa ca dūrataḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5213: kumārakāṇāṃ ca kumārikāṇāṃ gandhena so jānati teṣa sthānam //
S04bsu036_u:5214: Saddhp_18.25 rājñāṃ pi so jānati cakravartināṃ balacakravartīnatha maṇḍalīnām /
S04bsu036_u:5215: kumārakāmātya tathaiva teṣāṃ gandhena cāntaḥpura sarva jānati //
S04bsu036_u:5216: Saddhp_18.26 paribhogaratnāni bahūvidhāni kupyāni bhūmau nihitāni yāni /
S04bsu036_u:5217: strīratnabhūtāni bhavanti yāpi gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5218: Saddhp_18.27 teṣāṃ ca yā ābharaṇā bhavanti kāyasmi āmukta vicitrarūpā /
S04bsu036_u:5219: vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5220: Saddhp_18.28 sthitāṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ śayitāṃ tathaiva krīḍāratiṃ ṛddhibalaṃ ca sarvam /
S04bsu036_u:5221: so jānatī ghrāṇabalena dhīro yo dhārayet sūtramidaṃ variṣṭham //
S04bsu036_u:5222: Saddhp_18.29 sugandhatailāna tathaiva gandhān nānāvidhān puṣpaphalāna gandhān /
S04bsu036_u:5223: sakṛtasthito jānati ghrāyate ca amukasmi deśasmi imasmi gandhān //
S04bsu036_u:5224: Saddhp_18.30 ye parvatānāṃ vivarāntareṣu bahu candanā puṣpita tatra santi /
S04bsu036_u:5225: ye cāpi tasminnivasanti sattvāḥ sarveṣa gandhena vidurvijānati //
S04bsu036_u:5226: Saddhp_18.31 ye cakravālasya bhavanti pārśve ye sāgarasyo nivasanti madhye /
S04bsu036_u:5227: pṛthivīya ye madhyi vasanti sattvāḥ sarvān sa gandhena vidurvijānati //
S04bsu036_u:5228: Saddhp_18.32 surāṃśca jānāti tathāsurāṃśca asurāṇa kanyāśca vijānate 'sau /
S04bsu036_u:5229: asurāṇa krīḍāśca ratiṃ ca jānati ghrāṇasya tasyedṛśakaṃ balaṃ hi //
S04bsu036_u:5230: Saddhp_18.33 aṭavīṣu ye keci catuṣpadāsti siṃhāśca vyāghrāstatha hastināgāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5231: mahiṣā gavā ye gavayaśca tatra ghrāṇena so jānati teṣa vāsam //
S04bsu036_u:5232: Saddhp_18.34 striyaśca yā gurviṇikā bhavanti kumārakāṃ vāpi kumārikāṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:5233: dhārenti kukṣau hi kilāntakāyā gandhena so jānati yaṃ tahiṃ syāt //
S04bsu036_u:5234: Saddhp_18.35 āpannasattvāṃ pi vijānate 'sau vināśadharmāṃ pi vijānate 'sau /
S04bsu036_u:5235: iyaṃ pi nārī vyapanītaduḥkhā prasaviṣyate puṇyamayaṃ kumāram //
S04bsu036_u:5236: Saddhp_18.36 puruṣāṇa abhiprāyu bahuṃ vijānate abhiprāyagandhaṃ ca tathaiva ghrāyate /
S04bsu036_u:5237: raktāna duṣṭāna tathaiva mrakṣiṇāṃ upaśāntacittāna ca gandha ghrāyate //
S04bsu036_u:5238: Saddhp_18.37 pṛthivīya ye cāpi nidhāna santi ghanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyam /
S04bsu036_u:5239: mañjūṣa lohī ca tathā supūrṇā gandhena so ghrāyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5240: Saddhp_18.38 hārārdhahārān maṇimuktikāśca anarghaprāptā vividhā ca ratnā /
S04bsu036_u:5241: gandhena so jānati tāni sarvā anarghanāmaṃ dyutisaṃsthitaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:5242: Saddhp_18.39 upariṃ ca deveṣu tathaiva puṣpā mandāravāṃścaiva mañjūṣakāṃśca /
S04bsu036_u:5243: yā pārijātasya ca santi puṣpā iha sthito ghrāyati tā sa dhīraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5244: Saddhp_18.40 vimāna ye yādṛśakāśca yasya udāra hīnāstatha madhyamāśca /
S04bsu036_u:5245: vicitrarūpāśca bhavanti yatra iha sthito ghrāṇabalena ghrāyati //
S04bsu036_u:5246: Saddhp_18.41 udyānabhūmiṃ ca tathā prajānate sudharma devāsani vaijayante /
S04bsu036_u:5247: prāsādaśreṣṭhe ca tathā vijānate ye co ramante tahi devaputrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5248: iha sthito ghrāyati gandhu teṣāṃ gandhena so jānati devaputrān /
S04bsu036_u:5249: Saddhp_18.42 iha sthito ghrāyati gandhu teṣāṃ gandhena so jānati devaputrān /
S04bsu036_u:5251: yo yatra karmā kurute sthito vā śete vā gacchati yatra vāpi //
S04bsu036_u:5252: Saddhp_18.43 yā devakanyā bahupuṣpamaṇḍitā āmuktamālyābharaṇā alaṃkṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5253: ramanti gacchanti ca yatra yatra gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5254: Saddhp_18.44 yāvadbhavāgrādupariṃ ca devā brahmā mahābrahma vimānacāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5255: tāṃścāpi gandhena tahiṃ prajānate sthitāṃśca dhyāne atha vyutthitān vā //
S04bsu036_u:5256: Saddhp_18.45 ābhāsvarān jānati devaputrān cyutopapannāṃśca apūrvakāṃśca /
S04bsu036_u:5257: ghrāṇendriyaṃ īdṛśa tasya bhoti yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet //
S04bsu036_u:5258: Saddhp_18.46 ya keci bhikṣū sugatasya śāsane abhiyuktarūpā sthita cakrameṣu /
S04bsu036_u:5259: uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca bhikṣavo sarvān hi so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5260: Saddhp_18.47 ye śrāvakā bhonti jinasya putrā viharanti kecit sada vṛkṣamūle /
S04bsu036_u:5261: gandhena sarvān vidu jānate tān amutra bhikṣū amuko sthito ti //
S04bsu036_u:5262: Saddhp_18.48 ye bodhisattvāḥ smṛtimanta dhyāyino uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca ye sadā /
S04bsu036_u:5263: parṣāsu dharmaṃ ca prakāśayanti gandhena tān jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5264: Saddhp_18.49 yasyāṃ diśāyāṃ sugato mahāmunirdharmaṃ prakāśeti hitānukampakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5265: puraskṛtaḥ śrāvakasaṃghamadhye gandhena so jānati lokanātham //
S04bsu036_u:5266: Saddhp_18.50 ye cāpi sattvā sya śṛṇoti dharmaṃ śrutvā ca ye prītamanā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:5267: iha sthito jānati bodhisattvo jinasya parṣāmapui tatra sarvām //
S04bsu036_u:5268: Saddhp_18.51 etādṛśaṃ ghrāṇabalaṃ sya bhoti na ca tāva divyaṃ bhavate sya ghrāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:5269: pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya tu eta bhoti divyasya ghrāṇasya anāsravasya //
S04bsu036_u:5270_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5271: sa tathārūpeṇa jihvendriyeṇa yān yān rasānāsvādayati,
S04bsu036_u:5274: tathā ca āsvādayiṣyati yathā na kaṃcid rasamamanaāpamāsvādayiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5275: ye 'pi amanaāpā rasāste 'pi tasya jihvendriye samupanikṣiptāḥ divyaṃ rasaṃ mokṣyante /
S04bsu036_u:5277: tena tasya te sattvāḥ prīṇitendriyā bhaviṣyanti tuṣṭāḥ paramatuṣṭāḥ prāmodyajātāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5278: madhuraścāsya valgumanojñasvaro gambhīro niścariṣyati hṛdayaṃgamaḥ premaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5281: te cāsya madhuranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā valgumanojñaṃ devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravanāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5282: devaputrā api devakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5283: śakrā api brahmāṇo 'pi brahmakāyikā api devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5284: nāgā nāgakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5285: asurā asurakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5286: garūḍā garūḍakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5290: piśācāḥ piśācakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5294: rājāno 'pi rājaputrā api rājāmātyā api rājamahāmātrā api darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:5296: cakravartino 'pi saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ sakumārāḥ sāmātyāḥ sāntaḥpuraparivārā darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti
S04bsu036_u:5298: tāvanmadhuraṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyate yathābhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ tathāgatena /
S04bsu036_u:5299: anye 'pi brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo naigamajānapadāstasya dharmabhāṇakasya [Vaidya_219] satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti yāvadāyuṣparyavasānam /
S04bsu036_u:5303: yasyāṃ ca diśi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vihariṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5307: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5308: Saddhp_18.52 jihvendriyaṃ tasya viśiṣṭu bhoti na jātu hīnaṃ rasa svādayeta /
S04bsu036_u:5309: nikṣiptamātrāśca bhavanti divyā rasena divyena samanvitāśca //
S04bsu036_u:5310: Saddhp_18.53 valgusvarāṃ madhura prabhāṣate girāṃ śravaṇīyamiṣṭāṃ ca manoramāṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5311: parṣāya madhyasmi ha premaṇīyaṃ gambhīraghoṣaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate //
S04bsu036_u:5312: Saddhp_18.54 yaścāpi dharmaṃ śṛṇute 'sya bhāṣato dṛṣṭāntakoṭīnayutairanekaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5313: prāmodya tatrāpi janeti so 'graṃ pūjāṃ ca tasya kurute 'prameyām //
S04bsu036_u:5314: Saddhp_18.55 devā pi nāgāsuraguhyakāśca draṣṭuṃ tamicchanti ca nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:5315: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ ca sagauravāśca ime guṇāstasya bhavanti sarve //
S04bsu036_u:5316: Saddhp_18.56 ākāṅkṣamāṇaśca ima lokadhātuṃ svareṇa sarvāmabhivijñapeyā /
S04bsu036_u:5317: snigdhaḥ svaro 'sya madhuraśca bhoti gambhīra valguśca supremaṇīyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5318: Saddhp_18.57 rājāna ye kṣitipati cakravartinaḥ pūjārthikāstasyupasaṃkramanti /
S04bsu036_u:5319: saputradārā kariyāṇa añjaliṃ śṛṇvanti dharmasya ca nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:5320: Saddhp_18.58 yakṣāṇa co bhoti sadā puraskṛto nāgāna gandharvagaṇāna caiva /
S04bsu036_u:5321: piśācakānāṃ ca piśācikānāṃ susatkṛto mānitu pūjitaśca //
S04bsu036_u:5322: Saddhp_18.59 brahmāpi tasya vaśavarti bhoti maheśvaro īśvara devaputraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5324: Saddhp_18.60 buddhāśca ye lokahitānukampakāḥ saśrāvakāstasya niśāmya ghoṣam /
S04bsu036_u:5325: karonti rakṣāṃ mukhadarśanāya tuṣṭāśca bhonti bruvato 'sya dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:5326_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayamāṇo
S04bsu036_u:5326_1: vā vācayamāno vā prakāśayamāno vā deśayamāno vā likhamāno vā aṣṭau kāyaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5327: tasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśuddho vaiḍūryapariśuddhacchavivarṇo bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5329: sa tasminnātmabhāve pariśuddhe sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5330: ye ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāścyavanti upapadyante ca,
S04bsu036_u:5334: ye ca cakravālamahācakravāleṣu merusumeruṣu ca parvatarājeṣu sattvāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5335: ye ca adhastādavīcyāmūrdhvaṃ ca yāvad bhavāgraṃ sattvāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5337: ye cāpi kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātrau śrāvakā vā pratyekabuddhā vā bodhisattvā vā tathāgatā vā prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5338: yaṃ ca te tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu036_u:5340: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāmātmabhāvapratilambhān sva ātmabhāve drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5343: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5344: Saddhp_18.61 pariśuddha tasyo bhavatetmabhāvo yathāpi vaiḍūryamayo viśuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5345: sattvāna nityaṃ priyadarśanaśca yaḥ sūtra dhāreti idaṃ udāram //
S04bsu036_u:5346: Saddhp_18.62 ādarśapṛṣṭhe yatha vimbu paśyet loko 'sya kāye ayu dṛśyate tathā /
S04bsu036_u:5348: svayaṃbhu so paśyati nānyi sattvāḥ pariśuddhi kāyasmi ima evarūpā //
S04bsu036_u:5349: Saddhp_18.63 ye lokadhātau hi ihāsti sattvā manuṣya devāsura guhyakā vā /
S04bsu036_u:5350: narakeṣu preteṣu tiraścayoniṣu pratibimbu saṃdṛśyati tatra kāye //
S04bsu036_u:5351: Saddhp_18.64 vimāna devāna bhavāgra yāvacchailaṃ pi co parvatacakravālam /
S04bsu036_u:5352: himavān sumeruśca mahāṃśca meruḥ kāyasmi dṛśyantimi sarvathaiva //
S04bsu036_u:5353: Saddhp_18.65 buddhān pi so paśyati ātmabhāve saśrāvakān buddhasutāṃstathānyān /
S04bsu036_u:5354: ye bodhisattvā viharanti caikakā gaṇe ca ye dharma prakāśayanti //
S04bsu036_u:5355: Saddhp_18.66 etādṛśī kāyaviśuddhi tasya yahi dṛśyate sarviya lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5356: na ca tāva so divya na prāpuṇoti prakṛtīya kāyasyiyamīdṛśī bhavet //
S04bsu036_u:5357_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgate parinirvṛte
S04bsu036_u:5357_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayato deśayataḥ saṃprakāśayato likhato vācayatastairdvādaśabhirmanaskāraguṇaśataiḥ
S04bsu036_u:5358: sa tena pariśuddhena manaindriyeṇa yadyekagāthāmapyantaśaḥ śroṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5360: sa tāvamabudhya tannidānaṃ māsamapi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5363: so 'sya smṛto na sa saṃpramoṣaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5364: ye kecillaukikā lokavyavahārā bhāṣyāṇi vā mantrā vā,
S04bsu036_u:5366: yāvantaśca kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsaranti,
S04bsu036_u:5369: apratilabdhe ca tāvadāryajñāne evaṃrūpaṃ cāsya manaindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:5370: yāṃ yāṃ ca dharmaniruktimanuvicintya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5374: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5375: Saddhp_18.67 manaindriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti prabhāsvaraṃ śuddhamanāvilaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5376: so tena dharmān vividhān prajānati hīnānathotkṛṣṭa tathaiva madhyamān //
S04bsu036_u:5377: Saddhp_18.68 ekāmapi gātha śruṇitva dhīro artha bahuṃ jānati tasya tatra /
S04bsu036_u:5378: samitaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate māsān pi catvāri tathāpi varṣam //
S04bsu036_u:5379: Saddhp_18.69 ye cāpi sattvā iha lokadhātau abhyantare bāhiri ye vasanti /
S04bsu036_u:5380: devā manuṣyāsuraguhyakāśca nāgāśca ye cāpi tiraścayoniṣu //
S04bsu036_u:5381: Saddhp_18.70 ṣaṭsu gatīṣu nivasanti sattvā vicintitaṃ teṣa bhaveta yaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5382: ekakṣaṇe sarvi vidurvijānate dhāretva sūtraṃ ima ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5383: Saddhp_18.71 yaṃ cāpi buddhaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇo dharmaṃ prakāśedida sarvaloke /
S04bsu036_u:5384: tasyāpi śabdaṃ śṛṇute viśuddhaṃ yaṃ cāpi so bhāṣati gṛhyate tat //
S04bsu036_u:5385: Saddhp_18.72 bahūn vicinteti ca agradharmān bahūṃśca so bhāṣati nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:5386: na cāsya saṃmoha kadāci bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5387: Saddhp_18.73 saṃdhiṃ visaṃdhiṃ ca vijānate 'sau sarveṣu dharmeṣu vilakṣaṇāni /
S04bsu036_u:5388: prajānate artha niruktayaśca yathā ca taṃ jānati bhāṣate tathā //
S04bsu036_u:5389: Saddhp_18.74 yaṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhotiha dīrgharātraṃ pūrvehi lokācariyehi sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:5390: taṃ dharma so bhāṣati nityakālaṃ asaṃtrasanto pariṣāya madhye //
S04bsu036_u:5391: Saddhp_18.75 manaindriyaṃ īdṛśamasya bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imu vācayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:5392: na ca tāva asaṅgaṃ labhate ha jñānaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya imaṃ tu bhoti //
S04bsu036_u:5393: Saddhp_18.76 ācāryabhūmau hi sthitaśca bhoti sarveṣa sattvāna katheya dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:5394: niruktikoṭīkuśalaśca bhoti imu dhārayanto sugatasya sutram //
S04bsu036_u:5399_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - anenāpi
S04bsu036_u:5399_1: tāvanmahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - yathā ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:5405: ye ca imamaevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:5407: teṣāmevamiṣṭo vipāko bhaviṣyati yādṛśo mayā pūrvaṃ parikīrtitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5409_1: pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena samayena bhīṣmagarjitasvararājo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu036_u:5409_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04bsu036_u:5409_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vinirbhoge kalpe mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:5410_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavān bhīṣmagarjitasvararājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5410_1: mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purato dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5411_0: yadidaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasamatikramāya
S04bsu036_u:5412: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya tathāgatajñānadarśanaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5413_0: tasya khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:5416_0: tasyāṃ khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya
S04bsu036_u:5416_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratirūpake ca antarhite
S04bsu036_u:5416_2: aparo 'pi bhīṣmagarjitasvararāja eva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
S04bsu036_u:5416_3: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
S04bsu036_u:5417: anayā mahāsthāmaprāpta paraṃparayā tasyāṃ mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhīṣmagarjitasvararājanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:5418: tatra mahāsthāmaprāpta yo 'sau tathāgataḥ sarvapūrvako 'bhūd bhīṣmagarjitasvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
S04bsu036_u:5419: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S04bsu036_u:5420_0: tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmapratirūpake ca antardhīyamāne
S04bsu036_u:5420_1: tasmin śāsane 'dhimānikabhikṣvadhyākrānte [Vaidya_225] sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo bhikṣurabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5421: kena kāraṇena mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāparibhūta ityucyate?
S04bsu036_u:5422: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yameva paśyati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣūṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5423: taṃ tamupasaṃkramya eva vadati - nāhamāyuṣmanto yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:5427: bhaviṣyatha yūyaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
S04bsu036_u:5428: anena mahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhikṣubhūto noddeśaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5431: sarvaṃ tamupaṃsakramya evaṃ saṃśrāvayati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5432: taṃ tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati - nāhaṃ bhaginyo yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:5437: yaṃ yameva mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā evaṃ saṃśrāvayati,
S04bsu036_u:5440: paribhūtamātmānaṃ karoti yadasmākaṃ vyākarotyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asantamanākāṅkṣitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5441: atha khalu mahāsthāmaprāpta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni varṣāṇi tathā ākruśyataḥ paribhāṣyamāṇasya gacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:5444: ye cāsya evaṃ saṃśrāvayato loṣṭaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā kṣipanti,
S04bsu036_u:5445: sa teṣāṃ dūrata eva uccaiḥsvaraṃ kṛtvā saṃśrāvayati sma - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:5446: tasya tābhirabhimānikabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃśrāvyamāṇābhiḥ sadāparibhūta iti nāma kṛtamabhūt //
S04bsu036_u:5447_0: tena khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kālakriyāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5447_1: pratyupasthitāyāṃ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5448: tena ca bhagavatā bhīṣmagarjitasvararājena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo viṃśatibhirgāthāviṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairbhāṣito 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5449: sa ca sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite antarīkṣanirghoṣādimaṃ dharmaparyāyamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu036_u:5450: yena kenacid bhāṣitamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān,
S04bsu036_u:5451: imāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ cakṣurviśuddhiṃ śrotraviśuddhiṃ ghrāṇaviśuddhiṃ jihvāviśuddhiṃ kāyaviśuddhiṃ manoviśuddhiṃ ca pratilabdhavān /
S04bsu036_u:5452: sahapratilabdhābhirviśuddhibhiḥ punaranyāni viṃśativarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ātmano jīvitasaṃskāramadhiṣṭhāya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:5454: ye pūrvaṃ nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti saṃśrāvitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5456: tasyodārarddhibalasthāmaṃ pratijñāpratibhānabalasthāmaṃ prajñābalasthāmaṃ [Vaidya_226] ca dṛṣṭvā sarve 'nusahāyībhūtā abhūvan dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu036_u:5457: sarve tena anyāni ca bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitānyabhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:5458: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataścyavitvā candrasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīśatānyārāgitavān,

S04bsu036_u:5463: so 'nenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyapūrveṇa meghasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatimeva tathāgatakoṭīśatasahasrāṇyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5467: śrotrapariśuddhyā ghrāṇapariśuddhayā jihvāpariśuddhayā kāyapariśuddhayā manaḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt //

S04bsu036_u:5468_1: koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:5468_2: anyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu036_u:5469: sarveṣu ca teṣu imameva saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5470: ārāgayitvā sa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena paripakvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5471: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5472: yastasya bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ sadāparibhūtaḥ saṃmato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5473: yena te tāvantastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitā abhūvan?
S04bsu036_u:5474: na khalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /

S04bsu036_u:5477: yadā mayā mahāsthāmaprāpta pūrvamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo nodgṛhīto 'bhaviṣyat,
S04bsu036_u:5480: yataścāhaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta paurvikāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāritavān vācitavān deśitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5482_0: yānyapi tāni mahāsthāmaprāpta tena sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhikṣuśatāni
S04bsu036_u:5482_1: bhikṣuṇīśatāni ca upāsakaśatāni upāsikāśatāni ca tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5488: daśa ca kalpasahasrāṇyavīcau mahānarake dāruṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5489: te ca sarve tasmāt karmāvaraṇāt parimuktāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5490: tenaiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripācitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:5491_0: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - katame tena
S04bsu036_u:5491_1: kālena tena samayena te sattvā abhūvan ye te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ ptahāsattvamullāpitavanta uccagghitavantaḥ?
S04bsu036_u:5492_0: asyāmeva mahāsthāmaprāpta parṣadi bhadrapālapramukhāṇi pañca bodhisattvaśatāni siṃhacandrāpramukhāni
S04bsu036_u:5493: evamiyaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta mahārthasya dharmaparyāyasya dhāraṇā vācanā deśanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā saṃvartate /
S04bsu036_u:5494: tasmāttarhi mahāsthāmaprāpta ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvairmahāsattvaistathāgate parinirvṛte abhīkṣṇaṃ dhārayitavyo vācayitavyo deśayitavyaḥ saṃprakāśayitavya iti //
S04bsu036_u:5495: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5496: Saddhp_19.1 atītamadhvānamanusmarāmi bhīṣmasvaro rāja jino yadāsi /
S04bsu036_u:5498: Saddhp_19.2 tasya jinasya parinirvṛtasya saddharma saṃkṣobha vrajanti paścime /
S04bsu036_u:5499: bhikṣū abhūṣī tada bodhisattvo nāmena so sadaparibhūta ucyate //
S04bsu036_u:5500: Saddhp_19.3 upasaṃkramitvā tada bhikṣu anyān upalambhadṛṣṭīna tathaiva bhikṣuṇī /
S04bsu036_u:5501: paribhāva mahyaṃ na kadācidasti yūyaṃ hi caryāṃ carathāgrabodhaye //
S04bsu036_u:5502: Saddhp_19.4 evaṃ ca saṃśrāvayi nityakālaṃ ākrośa paribhāṣa sahantu teṣām /
S04bsu036_u:5503: kālakriyāyāṃ samupasthitāyāṃ śrutaṃ idaṃ sūtramabhūṣi tena //
S04bsu036_u:5504: Saddhp_19.5 akṛtva kālaṃ tada paṇḍitena adhiṣṭhihitvā ca sudīrghamāyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5505: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tadāsīt tahi śāsane tasya vināyakasya //
S04bsu036_u:5506: Saddhp_19.6 te cāpi sarve bahu opalambhikā bodhīya tena paripācitāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:5508: Saddhp_19.7 anupūrva puṇyena kṛtena tena prakāśayitvā imu sūtra nityam /
S04bsu036_u:5509: bodhiṃ sa saṃprāpta jinasya putro ahameva so śākyamunistadāsīt //
S04bsu036_u:5510: Saddhp_19.8 ye cāpi bhikṣū tada opalambhikā yā bhikṣuṇī ye ca upāsakā vā /
S04bsu036_u:5511: upāsikāstatra ca yā tadāsīd ye bodhi saṃśrāvita paṇḍitena //
S04bsu036_u:5512: Saddhp_19.9 te cāpi dṛṣṭvā bahubuddhakoṭya ime ca te pañcaśatā anūnakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5513: tathaiva bhikṣūṇa ca bhikṣuṇī ca upāsikāścāpi mi mahya saṃmukham //
S04bsu036_u:5514: Saddhp_19.10 sarve mayā śrāvita agradharmā te caiva sarve paripācitā me /
S04bsu036_u:5515: mayi nirvṛte cāpimi sarvi dhīrā imu dhārayiṣyanti ha sūtramagram //
S04bsu036_u:5516: Saddhp_19.11 kalpāna koṭyo bahubhīracintyairna kadācidetādṛśa dharma śrūyate /
S04bsu036_u:5517: buddhāna koṭīśata caiva bhonti na ca te pimaṃ sūtra prakāśayanti //
S04bsu036_u:5518: Saddhp_19.12 tasmācchrūṇitvā idamevarūpaṃ parikīrtitaṃ dharmu svayaṃ svayaṃbhūvā /
S04bsu036_u:5519: ārāgayitvā ca punaḥ punaścimaṃ prakāśayet sūtra mayīha nirvṛte //
S04bsu036_u:5524: atha khalu yāni tāni sāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pṛthivīvivarebhyo niṣkrāntāni,
S04bsu036_u:5525_0: tāni sarvāṇi bhagavato 'bhimukhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayaṃ bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:5525_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāni yāni bhagavato buddhakṣetrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:5528: arthino vayaṃ bhagavan anenaikavamudāreṇa dharmaparyāyeṇa dhāraṇāya vācanāya deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya vā likhanāya //
S04bsu036_u:5529: atha khalu mañjuśrīpramukhāni bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāni asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau vāstavyāni,
S04bsu036_u:5531: bahavaśca gaṅgānadīvālikopamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya addaṣṭenātmabhāvena,
S04bsu036_u:5534_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ teṣāṃ paurvikāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5534_1: gaṇināṃ mahāgaṇināṃ gaṇācāryāṇāmekaṃ pramukhaṃ viśiṣṭacāritraṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5534_2: mahāsattvaṃ mahāgaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryamāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu viśiṣṭacāritra /
S04bsu036_u:5537: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ stūpamadhye /
S04bsu036_u:5541: tābhyāṃ ca jihvendriyābhyāṃ bahūni raśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S04bsu036_u:5542: tāsu ca raśmiṣvekaikasyā raśmerbahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5543: suvarṇavarṇāḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5544: te ca bodhisattvā digvidikṣu lokadhātuśatasahasreṣu visṛtāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5546_0: yathaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5546_1: karoti prabhūtaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tathaiva te sarve tathāgatā
S04bsu036_u:5547: ye te 'nyalokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo 'bhyāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭā jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ kurvanti //
S04bsu036_u:5548: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ te ca sarve tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tamṛddhayabhisaṃskāraṃ paripūrṇaṃ varśaśatasahasraṃ kṛtavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5549_0: atha khalu varṣaśatasahasrasyātyayena te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstāni
S04bsu036_u:5549_1: jihvendriyāṇi punarevopasaṃhṛtya ekasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte samakālaṃ sarvairmahāsiṃhotkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5551: tena ca mahotkāsanaśabdena mahācchaṭāsaṃghātaśabdena yāvanti daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:5553: prakampitāni saṃprakampitāni calitāni pracalitāni saṃpracalitāni vedhitāni pravedhitāni saṃpravedhitāni /
S04bsu036_u:5554: teṣu ca sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāvantaḥ sarvasattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5555: te 'pi sarve buddhānubhāvena tatrasthā evamimāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:5556_0: tāni ca sarvatathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni
S04bsu036_u:5556_1: bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5556_2: prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ tasya mahāratnastūpasya
S04bsu036_u:5556_3: madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatena sārdhaṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ tāśca
S04bsu036_u:5557: dṛṣṭvā ca āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:5558: evaṃ ca antarīkṣād ghoṣamaśrauṣuḥ - eṣa mārṣā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5560: sa etarhi saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
S04bsu036_u:5562: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ namaskurudhvam //
S04bsu036_u:5563_0: atha khalu te sarvasattvā imamevaṃrūpamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tatrasthā eva namo
S04bsu036_u:5563_1: bhagavate śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti vācaṃ bhāṣante sma añjaliṃ pragṛhya /
S04bsu036_u:5564: vividhāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyo yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātustena kṣipanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:5565: nānavidhāni cābharaṇāni pindhāṇi hārārdhahāramaṇiratnānyapi kṣipanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:5566: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe,
S04bsu036_u:5568: tāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyastāni ca hārārdhahāramaṇiratnāni kṣiptāni imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:5571: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānāmantrayāmāsa - acintyaprabhāvāḥ kulaputrāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5572: bahūnyapyahaṃ kulaputrāḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi asya dharmaparyāyasya parīndanārthaṃ nānādharmapramukhairbahūnānuśaṃsān bhāṣeyam /
S04bsu036_u:5573: na cāhaṃ guṇānāṃ pāraṃ gaccheyamasya dharmaparyāyasya bhāṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5574: saṃkṣepeṇa kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhavṛṣabhitā sarvabuddharahasyaṃ sarvabuddhagambhīrasthānaṃ mayā asmin dharmaparyāye deśitam /
S04bsu036_u:5575: tasmāttarhi kulaputrā yuṣmābhistathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyo deśayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ prakāśayitavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5576_0: [Vaidya_231] yasmiṃśca kulaputrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśe ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo vācyeta vā prakāśyeta
S04bsu036_u:5576_1: vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā cintyeta vā bhāṣyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā pustakagato vā tiṣṭhat
S04bsu036_u:5576_2: ārāme vā vihāre vā gṛhe vā vane vā nagare vā vṛkṣamūle vā prāsāde vā layane vā guhāyāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5579: sarvatathāgatānāṃ hi sa pṛthivīpradeśo bodhimaṇḍo veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5580: tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe sarvatathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā iti veditavyam /
S04bsu036_u:5583: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5584: Saddhp_20.1 acintiyā lokahitāna dharmatā abhijñajñānasmi pratiṣṭhitānām /
S04bsu036_u:5585: ye ṛddhi darśenti anantacakṣuṣaḥ prāmodyahetoriha sarvadehinām //
S04bsu036_u:5586: Saddhp_20.2 jihvendriyaṃ prāpiya brahmalokaṃ raśmīsahasrāṇi pramuñcamānāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5587: āścaryabhūtā iha ṛddhidarśitāḥ te sarvi ye prasthita agrabodhau //
S04bsu036_u:5588: Saddhp_20.3 utkāsitaṃ cāpi karonti buddhā ekācchaṭā ye ca karonti śabdam /
S04bsu036_u:5589: te vijñapentī imu sarvalokaṃ daśo diśāyāṃ ima lokadhātum //
S04bsu036_u:5590: Saddhp_20.4 etāni cānyāni ca prātihāryā guṇānnidarśenti hitānukampakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5591: kathaṃ nu te harṣita tasmi kāle dhāreyu sūtraṃ sugatasya nirvṛte //
S04bsu036_u:5592: Saddhp_20.5 bahū pi kalpāna sahasrakoṭyo vadeya varṇaṃ sugatātmajānām /
S04bsu036_u:5594: Saddhp_20.6 na teṣa paryanta bhavedguṇānāṃ ākāśadhātau hi yathā diśāsu /
S04bsu036_u:5595: acintiyā teṣā guṇā bhavanti ye sūtra dhārenti idaṃ śubhaṃ sadā //
S04bsu036_u:5596: dṛṣṭo ahaṃ sarva ime ca nāyakā ayaṃ ca yo nirvṛtu lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5597: Saddhp_20.7 dṛṣṭo ahaṃ sarva ime ca nāyakā ayaṃ ca yo nirvṛtu lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5599: ime ca sarve bahubodhisattvāḥ parṣāśca catvāri anena dṛṣṭāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5600: Saddhp_20.8 ahaṃ ca ārāgitu tenihādya ime ca ārāgita sarvi nāyakāḥ /
